templates.name: Is your linen organic?
templates.content: Our linen is made with natural flax fibers, but it is not certified organic. Our linen is Oeko-TexÂ® certified though. This means that every chemical or dye used to make our bedding has been rigorously tested to make sure it's safe for human use. Many times, items made with organic fibers still use harmful chemicals, and they'll be labelled "organic", but they may not necessarily be safe for your health.

templates.name: Cancel/edit order
templates.content:
I'm afraid once an order is placed, we are unable to modify the items in it. If your order has not shipped, we can cancel it and help place a new order for the desired changes. Please contact our Customer Support team for further assistance within 24 hours via this link: https://support.super73.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

You can also take a look at our cancellation policy at the following link: https://super73.com/pages/returns-and-cancellations

templates.name: Can I order online and pick it up?
templates.content: You can't order online and pick it up at the store. You can however call the store, place your order and pick it up when it's convenient for you.

templates.name: Did I win the gift card / SLEEP WEEK?
templates.content: Thank you for reaching out! The winners have been contacted through email, please check your email including spam and promo folders to see if you were among the lucky ones! We thank you for your participation.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at  info@gbsneakers.com. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Can I wash my Bellamis? How often should I wash them?
templates.content: Absolutely, try staying away from shampoos with sulfate in them and use hydrating conditioners. Leave-in conditioners and heat protectants will prolong your hair life span. Only wash your hair extensions when they look like they need it as they're not attached to your scalp, they don't receive the natural oils as our own hair does, so there's no need to wash them as often.

templates.name: How will I know when my order is ready to be picked up?
templates.content: We'll send you a VIP confirmation email when your order is ready. Most orders will be ready for pickup within three hours (when orders are placed before 2PM). We'll also let you know what to bring to the store to pick up your order. In-store pickup is only available during store hours, so don't forget to check them before heading out.

templates.content: They both feature 10W wireless charging and they have an extra USB-A and a USB-C port for charging extra wired devices. The primary difference is the Apple watch version features an MFi certified Apple watch charging puck, as well.

templates.name: Will the active leather strap fit both size Apple watches?
templates.content: The strap will only fit the corresponding Apple watches.  For example, the 38/40mm Apple watch bands will only fit the 38 or 40mm size apple watch. Similarly, the 42/44mm Apple watch bands will only fit the 42 or 44mm apple watch. The active strap will only fit the larger 42/44mm AW, however keep an eye out as we'll have some new straps for the smaller apple watch soon.

templates.name: Why are your wallets so expensive?
templates.content: They are hand crafted in the US, and the Shell Cordovan style leather is quite expensive to make.

templates.name: Active leather vs Horween leather?
templates.content: Horween is genuine leather and it feels like traditional leather whereas active leather is waterproof and feels slightly different, but is still similar in character to genuine leather. The main difference between the two would be that Active cases are good for people who are often using their phone/devices where they could potentially get wet. Also, Active leather doesn't patina like Horween leather.

templates.name: Corporate sales

templates.name: Does the wireless charger have a built in rechargeable battery?

templates.name: V1 vs V2 airpod cases
templates.content: Our first generation AirPods cases don't have a hole in the front to view the wireless charging indicator on AirPods2.

templates.name: Weight of steel band vs. titanium
templates.content: Steel weighs 115g and titanium weighs 72g.

templates.name: Can the Rugged Case for the iPad Pro be used along with Apple's smart folio?

templates.content: Our products are designed in California, leather is from either Horween in the US or Heinen (Active leather) in Germany, everything is manufactured and assembled in China.

templates.content: The weight of it is around 0.269 kg = 0.593 lb.

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: We ship from Hong Kong.

templates.name: Will the apple watch mount fit base station hub?
templates.content: Unfortunately, the Apple watch mount is engineered specifically to fit the base station pro, and won't work as a standalone product, nor will it fit on the base station hub.

templates.name: Do your ipad cases work with the magic keyboard?
templates.content: None of our iPad cases work with magic keyboard.

templates.name: Does base station hub work for Android?
templates.content: Yes, all of our wireless chargers support any devices that are Qi wireless charging compatible, which includes androids.

templates.name: I am looking at the Base Station. Would I be able to charge my iPad Pro 12.9 in from the USB port?
templates.content: Yes, it should work.

templates.name: Can apple watch adapter clip work with base station hub edition?
templates.content: Unfortunately, the clip on apple watch adapter can only be applied to the base station pro.

templates.name: Weight for iPad 12.9 rugged folio and non folio
templates.content: The rugged case for ipad pro 12.9" is 0.197 kg  and the rugged folio is 0.330 kg.

templates.name: how many inches of cable are needed to go through the channel in the back of the apple watch stand?
templates.content: 7.75 in / 197mm of the cable is used inside the Apple watch stand. We measured from the beginning of the cable (near puck) to the exit hole on back of the stand.

templates.name: Box dimensions of base station hub edition
templates.content: Dimensions of the box are 1.97in x 7.5in x 10.25in. We donât have the weight for just the box itself, but the weight of the box and all inner packaging is around 1 lb.

templates.name: What cables comes with the Base Station Hub Edition and which cables do I need/will work for my device?
templates.content: It's bundled with a 1.5-meter power adapter and you will need to purchase a USB-C - https://nomadgoods.com/collections/cables-usb-c and USB-A -https://nomadgoods.com/collections/cables-universal/products/universal-kevlar-cable cable separately to use in each of their respective ports.

templates.name: Why is only one LED light working/on in my Base Station Hub Edition?
templates.content: There are 3 LEDs on the front of the base station hub edition that correspond to each of the 3 charging areas of the wireless pad. The LED will only turn on when a device is charging on the associated area of the wireless pad to indicate that it is charging. The others will remain off unless another device is placed on the pad.

templates.name: Will the USB-A Universal Cable charger work on my iPad Pro?
templates.content: It won't, you need to use a USB-C to lightning cable to charge the iPad Pro. Find it here - https://nomadgoods.com/products/usb-c-lightning-kevlar-cable

templates.name: Light indicator on wireless charger
templates.content: Our current wireless chargers have LEDs that only light up white when devices are charging and then switch off when the device reaches 100%. The LED will flash on/off continuously to signify a non Qi-enabled device has been placed on the charging surface.

templates.name: Can I get the natural leather strap wet? And do you recommend leather conditioner?
templates.content: We donât recommend getting the strap wet if you can avoid it, but a little water here or there will be fine if it has a chance to dry out. When leather is exposed to moisture repeatedly without a chance to dry out it can develop bumps/bubbles. We recommend using a leather conditioner on the strap as it will help restore good oils and protect the leather!

templates.name: Does your Base Station Hub Edition protect from overcharging?
templates.content: Yes! The Qi device will communicate when the device has completed charging and will stop. The Qi device is the regulator of the power communication, so the base station won't overheat/overcharge the device.

templates.name: How does your Base station pro cool down?
templates.content: There's no fan, but there's an internal throttle that is regulated by the receiving device (iPhones, Airpods, etc.) to prevent overheating/overcharging.

templates.name: 3m kevlar cable specs
templates.content: It's USB 2.0 and 480 Mbps data transfer, so no 4k video.

templates.name: Is iphone 12 compatible with wireless charging?
templates.content: Yes, iPhone 12 Pro is still compatible with Qi wireless charging!

templates.name: Are your products compatible with the MagSafe charger from apple?
templates.content: We confirmed that our modern cases will align and connect with MagSafe chargers. but it's unclear how securely other items will attach for now, keep an eye out for updates!

templates.name: Does the base station Apple Watch Edition have the ability to accept software updates?
templates.content: No, it doesn't. Only our Base Station Pro can get firmware updates.

templates.name: Will the new iPhone 12 pro max fit in the Tesla 3 charger pad?
templates.content: Yes, it will fit without a case; we haven't been able to test with specific cases on yet, but definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Will your folio cases put the phone to sleep? Is the magnetic closure?
templates.content: No, folio cases won't put your phone to sleep. Also, there is no magnetic closure mechanism.

templates.name: What are the dimensions of the Base Station Stand?
templates.content: The Base Station Stand is 13 cm x 23 cm x 8 cm!

templates.name: Will you be making Active cases for iPhone 12?
templates.content: We donât have any plans to make Active cases for iPhone 12 series.

templates.name: Will you be making a MagSafe case similar to Appleâs?
templates.content: We have no immediate plans, but our engineers are looking into the technology and we will post about any updates in the future, definitely keep an eye out.

templates.name: Will Base Station Pro support iPhone 12 wireless charging? Will the magnets in the iPhone 12 cause any issues for Base Station Pro?
templates.content: The last firmware update for Base Station Pro was released in May 2021. It has limited compatibility with: iPhone 12 mini ~8.0 hours charge time, iPhone 12 and 12 pro ~8.5 hours charge time, iPhone 12: Pro Max ~9.5 hours charge time. The magnets in the iPhone 12 series have also been found to reduce charging efficiency, resulting in slower charging times. All devices enter a slower charging mode once the battery level exceeds 80% due to battery chemistry limitations, which is especially pronounced in Base Station Pro.

templates.name: Will Base Station Pro now support 15W charging for iPhone 12 since MagSafe supports 15W charging?
templates.content: Right now Base Station Pro doesn't support 15W wireless charging for any device, however, we hope to be able to incorporate faster-charging speeds in a future firmware update for Base Station Pro once we learn more about MagSafe.

templates.name: What makes FreePowerâ¢ better than other wireless chargers?
templates.content: Most wireless chargers have a very limited âactive areaâ that requires precise alignment for devices to charge. This small active area leads to frustrating user experiences and dead phones. FreePowerâ¢, on the other hand, makes the entire charging surface active, so devices placed anywhere across the surface will charge. Thereâs no need to âalignâ the device or worry about whether it has been knocked out of alignment, unlike typical chargers, where you might wake up to a dead phone because somehow the device moved slightly off the active area. With FreePowerâ¢, you can just drop your device on the charger without a second thought which offers unparalleled convenience and peace of mind, so we encourage you to try it out!

templates.name: Is Base Station Pro compatible with all of my devices?
templates.content: Check out what all it's compatible with here: https://help.nomadgoods.com/article/uhiqmuhb1p-is-base-station-pro-compatible-with-all-of-my-devices

templates.name: How long will it take Base Station Pro to charge my phone from 0-100%?
templates.content: Its wireless charging technology can charge up to 3 devices at once at 7.5W each, therefore, it can provide a full charge to an iPhone 11 Pro in about 3.5hr, an iPhone 11 in 4hr, and an iPhone 11 Pro Max in around 4.5hr. These charging rates are only applicable when no apps are running in the background because the rates are reduced by music, talking on the phone, high temperatures surrounding the charger, thickness of the case used on your phone, etc.

templates.name: Are your items antimicrobial?
templates.content: No, they're not antimicrobial.

templates.name: Weight for iPhone 11's Modern Folio
templates.content: The weight of the iPhone 11's modern folio case is 2.4 oz.

templates.content: The Rugged Folio isn't compatible with the 4th gen iPad Air. Our product team has something in the works for the 4th gen iPad Air currently, though, so keep an eye out.

templates.name: Lights on base station pro
templates.content: The base station pro only has white LEDs (no amber LEDs) that indicate whether a device is currently charging.

templates.name: Is horween leather sensitive to moisture?
templates.content: Horween leather is definitely sensitive to moisture. if itâs continuously exposed to moisture the leather will blister and become really rough, but if itâs dried off completely after being exposed, it should be fine. Treating the leather with leather conditioner regularly will definitely help to protect it and restore the patina after exposure to moisture

templates.name: Max current for the battery cable
templates.content: The max current that the battery cable provides to an Apple device is 5V/1A, so it wonât charge devices as fast as a normal lightning cable will (which is about 5V/2.4A).

templates.name: How thick of a case can the base station pro charge through

templates.content: The Rokform case should work on our wireless charging devices, but you would have to remove the magnet from your case first. Credit cards, metallic cards, RFID cards, magnets or other similar items stored on the rear case pockets may be damaged and/or impact wireless charging performance.

templates.name: Is the Natural Modern Case for the iPhone 12 pro max compatible with a FloLab nano armor screen protector?
templates.content: Yes, it is compatible.

templates.name: Is the slim wallet RFID protected?

templates.name: Difference between PU and Horween iPad Folio
templates.content: PU is a soft-touch performance polymer that resists scuffs and scratches, while the modern folio horween leather is wrapped in supple horween leather that develops a patina with time and takes on a look totally unique to your case.

templates.name: How and when should I use the leather conditioner on my leather products?
templates.content: You can use the conditioner to protect your products, rejuvenate old leather goods, or for a regular clean and polish. Start with a very small amount, about the size of a grain of rice, and gently spread the conditioner across the leather surface with a cloth. Wipe up any excess conditioner that does not soak into the leather and gently buff with a clean cloth before use. Here's an exemplary video - https://youtu.be/MaSwJuxJwZw I don't recommend using the conditioner on our active leather, which naturally has a different oil content and does not benefit from a conditioner like this. Also,  the conditioner may slightly darken light shades of leather.

templates.name: Is the rugged case for iPhone XS compatible with iPhone X?
templates.content: The Rugged Case for iPhone XS is also compatible with iPhone X. Since the location of the camera lens on the iPhone X is just slightly different than that of the XS, the lens opening on the case is imperfect on the iPhone X by only a millimeter or so. The overall function of the case is fully compatible with both iPhone X and XS.

templates.name: Weight for Modern Folio with MagSafe for iPhone 12
templates.content: The Modern Folio with MagSafe for iPhone 12 weighs 65g.

templates.name: Are leather products water resistant?
templates.content: For our Horween leather products, discoloration or drying out may result if exposed to water. The discoloration that can result from exposure to water may be permanent and this is not covered under the products warranty as a returnable item. Our Active Leather products made with water resistant Heinen leather are designed to be exposed to water regularly and shouldn't be damaged with exposure.

templates.name: Does it work if I have a metal back plate on my case?
templates.content: No, Base Station Pro doesn't support charging for devices that have a metal plate inserted between the phone and its case.

templates.name: Can base station pro fit two watch charger adapters?
templates.content: Yes, you can attach two Apple Watch Mounts to the Base Station Pro! Just a heads up that you have to plug each Apple Watch charging cable into its own power source as they canât be plugged into the Base Station Pro itself for power.

templates.name: Weights for iPad Air Cases cases
templates.content: The rugged case in Horween Leather for iPad Air weighs 154g. The rugged folio in Horween Leather for iPad Air weighs 291g. The rugged case in Performance PU for iPad Air weighs 145g and the rugged folio in Performance PU for iPad Air weighs 279g.

templates.name: How does the Airtag attach to the leather keychain?
templates.content: The AirTag can be inserted diagonally through the side of the leather keychain and pushed down into the thermoformed pocket that fits around the AirTag. There are magnets inside the black area right above the leather thermoformed pocket that will snap the top of the keychain together so that the AirTag will remain secure inside the pocket.

templates.name: Are your wallets waterproof?
templates.content: No, all our wallets are made out of Horween or Shell Cordovan leather which isn't waterproof.

templates.name: Where can I find the wallpaper in your products?
templates.content: You can find the wallpaper we use for our products here: https://nomadgoods.com/pages/wallpapers

templates.content: Our cases/folios aren't compatible with the 2021 iPad Pro 11-inch (3rd gen) and if anything changes, an update will be posted on the website. Also, our cases for iPad Pro 12.9-inch aren't compatible with the new iPad Pro 12.9-inch (2021).

templates.name: Do you offer gift wrapping/include price on order slip
templates.content: We donât offer gift wrapping but we also don't include the prices of items on the order slip that's included in the package.

templates.name: What animal is used in making Horween leather?
templates.content: Horween Leather is sourced primarily from cowhide and horsehide, and also smaller quantities of calf and bison hides.

templates.name: Will the air tag work with android?
templates.content: The Rugged Pet Tag for AirTag is a case that is only compatible with Appleâs AirTag. I donât believe Appleâs AirTag will work with Android but more information can be found here: https://www.apple.com/shop/buy-airtag/airtag

templates.name: Is 44/42mm and 40mm/38mm the length of the strap?
templates.content: No, 44mm/42mm and 40mm/38mm refer to the width of the lugs on the strap (a lug is the area of the strap that inserts into the Apple Watch), not the length. The lug sizes correspond with the different sizes for Apple Watch.

templates.name: When I put the phone on the base station should, how many lights should I see to know it's working?
templates.content: Upon initial plug in, all 3 LEDs will flash on signaling power to the unit, however, once the device is placed on a certain side/ coil, the according LED will be stay lit indicating that the device is receiving a charge. The full Base Station Hub product manual with more info can also be found here:  https://help.nomadgoods.com/article/cwttniz9hl-base-station-hub-edition-product-manual

templates.name: Are your leather products vegan leather?
templates.content: None of the leather products are vegan, but the non-leather products are vegan.

templates.name: Does it harm the phone to be left on the station after the phone is fully charged?
templates.content: Once the internal lithium-ion battery hits 100% of its capacity, charging stops. If you leave the smartphone plugged in overnight, it is going to use a bit of energy constantly trickling new juice to the battery every time it falls to 99% but it won'y harm your battery.

templates.name: International shipping
templates.content: We do offer international shipping! We proudly ship to the following countries: https://www.inkedshop.com/pages/international-shipping

templates.name: Do you ship out sample packets of leather conditioner?
templates.content: Yes, we do ship a sample packet of leather conditioner with every order that includes a Horween leather product.

templates.name: What would you recommend for polishing light scratches on titanium and steel bands?
templates.content: Our Titanium and the newer Steel Bands have an advanced Diamond-Like Carbon coating that protects the metal finish from scratching. Micro scratches can still occur in some rare cases if the band is rubbed against a surface that is harder than the DLC coating, but, unfortunately, due to the nature of the protective DLC coating, the surface of the band can't be polished to remove scratches.

templates.name: Engraving for pet tag
templates.content: The engraving is centered and the first line will be a slightly larger font size depending on the number of characters entered for the engraving.

templates.name: Do the google pixel buds fit the regular google pixel buds 2
templates.content: Yes, our Rugged Case for Pixel Buds fits Google Pixel Buds 2.

templates.name: Does the AirPods Pro Rugged Case affect wireless charging?
templates.content: Our AirPods Pro Rugged Cases are Qi wireless compatible and doesn't affect wireless charging.

templates.name: How to clean my leather items?
templates.content: To clean the leather, mix a solution of warm water and dish soap, dip a soft cloth into it and wipe it. Use a second clean, damp cloth to wipe off the soap and dry with a towel. Warm, soapy water will also remove water stains and scuffs.

templates.name: What is the strain relief on your Kevlar Cables made from?
templates.content: The strain relief on our Kevlar Cables is made of silicon.

templates.name: Is your leather real? / Quality Grade of your leather? / Is your leather prepared before it's sent over to the manufacturer?
templates.content: Our Horween leather is genuine, full-grain, and minimally treated leather. Horween Leather Co. of Chicago, IL is one of Americaâs oldest tanneries. Horween leather is fully prepared at their tannery in Chicago, IL. Read about it here: https://www.horween.com/

templates.name: Does the new Rugged Pet Tag allow the engraving on the Air Tag to show through?
templates.content: No, the Rugged Keychain / Rugged Pet Tag covers the entire AirTag so any engraving that is on the AirTag itself isn't visible at all when inside.

templates.name: Does the card wallet fit cash?
templates.content: Card wallet doesn't fit cash. Our card wallet plus and bifold wallet are perfect for carrying cash. And yes, you could potentially fit cash in that middle pocket for the card wallet, but you'd have to fold it up a couple of times, which isn't ideal. Alternatively, you could use the middle pocket to hold 3-4 additional cards.

templates.name: Can I remove the AirTag from leather loop to replace the AirTag battery?
templates.content: Yes, the leather will flex enough to allow you to safely remove the AirTag battery but keep in mind that the adhesive adheres to both sides of the AirTag, but there should still be enough flexibility in the leather to allow you to twist open the battery door on the AirTag without needing to remove the adhesive.

templates.name: What material attaches the two pieces of leather at the top of leather keychain?
templates.content: There are magnets inside the black area right above the leather thermoformed pocket that will snap the top of the keychain together so that the AirTag will remain secure inside the pocket.

templates.name: How do I insert my AirTag into leather keychain?
templates.content: The AirTag can be inserted diagonally through the side of the leather keychain and pushed down into the thermoformed pocket that fits around the AirTag. There are magnets inside the black area right above the leather thermoformed pocket that will snap the top of the keychain together so that the AirTag will remain secure inside the pocket.

templates.name: What is the difference between rugged keychain and rugged pet tag?

templates.name: Return policy for rugged keychain and rugged pet tag
templates.content: Orders for rugged keychain or pet tag including a metal engraving can't be returned. If you ordered either of these without an engraving, and it is in unused condition with original packaging still intact, then it can be returned (for free if inside the U.S.) or exchanged within 30 days of the shipping date.

templates.name: How do I install rugged keychain or rugged pet tag?
templates.content: Simply slide rugged keychain a quarter turn to open, insert your AirTag, and quarter turn your rugged keychain to close. The same process applies to rugged pet tag.

templates.name: My Rugged/Modern Case is almost brand new and I already have marks/marring/scratches on it.
templates.content: Since the genuine and minimally treated Horween leather that we use for this case is a completely natural material, it's subject to change over time with daily use and wear. This is expected and all a part of the patination process. The Horween leather used for our products is made in the traditional style dating back to 1905. Most leathers use synthetic tanning chemicals, synthetic dyes, spray paints and spray sealants to make a "perfect" surface. Our Horween leather is minimally treated, vegetable-tanned, imbued with natural waxes and oils during the process, and the surface is not sprayed with a synthetic sealant, allowing it to develop a beautiful patina over time with daily use. With continued use and even a little extra care using a leather conditioner, these scratches will buff out. As your case develops more of a patina, it will become less susceptible to these scratches.

templates.name: I just received my  Modern/Rugged Case and it has a very bad smell/odor/stink to it!
templates.content: We have encountered some smelly leather products from time to time and found the best way to get rid of the smell is to try to dry out the leather as much as possible using baking soda. Place a handful of baking soda in a clean sock or bag made of breathable material. Remove your case from your device and place it in the sock/bag with the baking soda. Place the sock/bag in an area that gets a lot of air flow and is out of direct sunlight. Let the case sit in the baking soda sit for a few nights then remove it from the sock/bag and wipe off an excess baking soda with a dry towel. If any smell remains, try repeating the process.

templates.name: Can I make a donation?
templates.content:
I'm afraid not. We're a business, specifically a public benefit corporation, which is why we cannot and do not accept donations. However, we understand that some people want to support our mission to end the ocean plastic crisis and help fund our global ocean cleanup operation without purchasing our products, which is why we launched the Pound+ Ocean Cleanup Service. 

With Pound+, you can choose how many pounds of trash you want to pull and pay just $10 per pound. This is not a tax deductible donation, but a service that provides value in exchange for your purchase. Think of it like hiring a landscaper to tend your lawn or hiring a maintenance service to care for your pool, except you're hiring our professional captains and crews to recover marine debris from one of our global cleanup locations. Each time you use our Pound+ service, we'll issue you a digital certificate that verifies your impact.

templates.name: How to use the cleaning cartridge
templates.content:
To use the cleaning cartridge, follow these steps: 

1. Plug in the station using the power cord.
2. Press the lift button to open the housing.
3. Place the new cartridge on a flat surface.
4. Remove the lid from the cartridge.
5. Slide the cartridge into the base of the station.
6. Close the housing by pushing it down until it locks.
7. The cleaning fluid display will show the amount of fluid in the cartridge.

Remember to always handle the cleaning cartridge carefully and follow the instructions provided to ensure proper usage and maintenance of the cleaning station.

templates.name: How do I replace the rubber gasket on my blade?
templates.content: The gasket is not designed to be removed and therefore is not replaceable. The gaskets are deep-seated, and factory sealed in the blade housing. The sealed gasket helps with cleaning and keeps food particles on the surface. We recommend replacing the entire blade after 6 months or as needed for optimal performance. If a gasket becomes worn, torn or loose, it may also be time to get a new blade.

templates.name: Will the Nolah Mattress Topper add firmness to my mattress?
templates.content:
It depends on the current firmness level of your mattress and which mattress topper option you choose: Plush or Luxury Firm. The Plush version has a 3/10 firmness level, while the Luxury Firm feels like a 5-7/10.

If you want a bed that feels softer and a sleep surface with more cushioning, choose the topper with a lower firmness level than your existing mattress. If you want a bit more pushback than your mattress currently offers, select the option with a higher firmness level.

templates.name: Do your products have refined sugar?

There is a small amount of refined sugar coming from the chocolate chips themselves, found only in our chocolate-flavored varieties. Our fair trade chocolate chips are ethically sourced and align with our food values and mission.

Our other non-chocolate flavors do not contain any refined sugar. The main source of sugar is from organic honey. We use it not only because it provides sweetness, but honey also acts as a natural preservative and helps hold the nut-butter together, as we do not use any chemical preservatives. Other sources of sugar in our bars vary by flavor but may include maple syrup, lactose coming from organic non-fat dry milk, added fruit and even peanuts themselves inherently contain some sugar.

templates.name: What form is your glutathione?
templates.content: The most common form is Reduced L-Glutathione (GSH) - it's most widely used but its absorption is quite low, which is why it is used in liposomal formulas where it is protected by liposomes in high-quality liposomal formulas, remember not all liposomes are actually liposomal - they just say they are but it's just vegetable oil! Everyone makes claims that one form works better than another. Some brands' glutathione is simply glutathione with an acetyl which binds to the molecule to increase potency but it doesn't have any protection in the body. Ours is GSH, the reduced form, which is the active state that is able to neutralize free radicals in the body. Partnered with our liposomal technology, this liposomal glutathione supplement maximizes absorption.

templates.name: Tousled Waves, Loose & Undone Waves, Defined & Polished Curls - How do I change the barrel?
templates.content: Turn the heat all the way off by pressing and holding the Power & Temperature Switch. Hold the tool by the handle with the barrel pointing up. Push the locking mechanism (the rose gold stand in the middle of the tool) to the left until the dot lines up with the "unlock" icon- you will hear a "click". Then pull the barrel out. To insert a new barrel, line up the three side pins in the barrel with the slots in the handle and insert the barrel firmly into the handle. Turn the locking mechanism to the lock position - you will hear a "click".

templates.name: Why is my camera sending photos nonstop?
templates.content:
Please check the letter on the photo info strip. If it's T, then "time lapse" is on. Turn it off and request a settings update. If there is an M on the photo info strip, then the camera is sensing motion. Both wind and temperature variations (bright sun/warmth vs. shade/cool) can cause false triggers. You may need to increase the trigger interval during the time of the day that the false triggers are more common and/or use Start-Stop times to use longer trigger intervals during the problem time of the day and regular ones for the rest of the day.

You can try adjusting Sensitivity, but it's usually best to leave it on Normal even when temperatures are outside the suggested range. Low is for temperatures colder than 10Â° F, Normal for between 10Â° F and 80Â° F, and High for temperatures higher than 80Â° F.

templates.name: How does purchasing a bracelet help clean the ocean?
templates.content: When you purchase a product, you're doing a lot more than removing one pound of trash from the ocean, rivers, and coastlines. You're also supporting our entire global ocean cleanup operation by funding new equipment, vessels, cleanup crews, facilities, development of new ocean cleaning technologies, recycling advancements, product innovation, awareness driving tactics, advocacy efforts, and more. There is a lot that goes into cleaning up the ocean and with your support, our crews are able to travel to plastic pollution impact zones, recover the plastic, transport that plastic back to our facilities, sort and clean the plastic, and recycle the plastic for future use. You're also restoring ecosystems and preventing marine animals from ingesting and becoming entangled in ocean plastic.

templates.name: Are there any known contraindications or side effects associated with Nutrafol Nutraceuticals?
templates.content:
Nutrafol takes safety incredibly seriously. Each of our full formulas undergoes a safety assessment by expert toxicologists for the formula's intended use and target population, including a review of ingredient upper tolerance and history of safe use.

Our Women's, Women's Vegan, Women's Balance, and Men's formulas are not recommended for women who are breastfeeding; and none of our formulas are recommended for women who are pregnant or may become pregnant. However, our Postpartum formula is breastfeeding-friendly.

If you have a medical condition or are taking medications-especially blood-thinning drugs or other supplements-we strongly advise consulting your doctor prior to using Nutrafol.

All that said, everyone is different and, therefore, may have different responses to nutraceutical supplements. Should you experience an adverse reaction while taking a Nutrafol product, please discontinue use, contact your doctor as appropriate, and contact us to tell us about your experience at support@nutrafol.com.

As always, we advise using Nutrafol products as directed and intended, and to always consult with your healthcare practitioner, especially if you have a medical condition or are taking medications or other supplements.

templates.name: How do you identify mines that meet its standards?
templates.content: We source our natural diamonds from approved mines with strong social and environmental governance practices in Botswana, Namibia, Lesotho, South Africa, and Canada, which are ranked low or moderate risk. We evaluate the labor, trade, and environmental standards of these natural diamond mining companies. These mining companies have been screened for information such as RJC certifications, the world's leading standard setting organization for the jewelry industry, and publicly available mining practices such as the DTC Best Practice Principles. We perform ongoing evaluations of mining companies for environmental and social risks, in-country supply chain risks, and geopolitical and environmental issues related to natural diamond supply chains. You can learn more about our responsibly mined diamonds here: https://www.brilliantearth.com/conflict-free-diamonds

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my leather furniture?
templates.content:
To keep the leather supple and prevent fading, protect it from exposure to direct sunlight and heating vents. Dust with a clean soft cloth, vacuum crevices regularly, and apply a quality conditioner a few times a year. Do not use the following products: saddle soap, cleaning solvents, furniture polish, oils, varnish, abrasive cleaners such as Windex, Formula 409, etc.

For minor spots and spills, immediately wipe with a soft, white cloth dampened with distilled water and let air dry - do not dry with hair dryers or heaters. For spills of butter, oil, or grease, wipe any excess with a clean, dry cloth. Do not apply water or try to wash the spot - leave the spot alone. The spot should dissipate into the leather after a short period of time.

templates.name: How long does it take to break in my mattress?

templates.name: How to care for a wooden cutting board
templates.content:
Gently hand wash your board after each use with mild soap and warm water, and be sure to refrain from soaking. Dry your board with a towel right after washing, and keep it in an upright position until it's completely dry.

We also suggest applying mineral oil as often as every few washes, or any time the wood feels dry. Just pour a healthy dose on your board, and then use a clean, soft towel to rub the oil into the wood. These best practices will help ensure your board lasts a lifetime and never warps or splits.

If you ever need to spot or deep clean your board, we suggest following the instructions in this helpful article we published on our site: https://food52.com/blog/23300-how-to-maintain-take-care-of-wooden-cutting-board-five-two

templates.name: Tips on entering the kayak from a dock
templates.content: Here are our tips and tricks for getting into the kayak. If you're entering the Oru Kayak from a dock, we suggest that you place the Oru Kayak in the water, parallel to the dock. Sit on the dock, parallel to the boat. Then place the paddle on top of the kayak, directly behind the cockpit and perpendicular to the boat. Still holding onto the paddle (pressing it into the kayak for support and stability), position yourself over the cockpit. Without sitting all the way into the cockpit, place both legs into the boat. Extend both legs into the boat, before sitting down completely into the cockpit. Do not sit down in the cockpit first and then try to extend your legs afterward.

templates.name: How does the big fig mattress compare to a foam mattress?
templates.content:
Our sleep support system is 1600 individually wrapped coil springs that actively respond to and push back when compressed. All-foam mattresses use a foam core for support that doesn't respond to the sleeper but rather absorbs their weight by compressing.

Heavier sleepers will tend to sleep "in" a foam mattress, as opposed to sleeping "on" it. Foam mattresses, particularly ones that utilize memory foam, will also tend to create cavities or depressions that the sleeper will sink into. This leads to discomfort and difficulty turning or rolling into a different position. Our spring support provides a more lively surface that will help you roll and turn to find the perfect position for a great night's sleep. It's the best of both worlds: an extremely comfortable mattress with exceptional durability.

Our Amerithon Challenge also allows biking and swimming. The catch? Challenge yourself. Push yourself, your health and your fitness levels, and work toward a better you.

Our participants come from all walks of life - age, size, shape, and ability varies. Our challenges can also be completed on a team - divide miles and complete the challenge with friends, family, coworkers, even strangers!

templates.name: How does the Personal Microderm work?
templates.content: The Personal Microderm is a once a week microdermabrasion treatment from the comfort of your own home! A spinning disc embedded with aluminum oxide crystals exfoliates away the entire top layer of dead, dull skin, while a vacuum suction triggers the production of collagen and elastin. When you do this treatment weekly, you're increasing the cell turnover rate which tells your body to produce an entirely new layer of fresh skin, while you're removing the old, damaged layer. This means you can say goodbye to the appearance of enlarged pores, dark spots, hyperpigmentation, fine lines and wrinkles, uneven skin tone and texture, and your skincare products can penetrate up to 20x deeper!

templates.name: Are my pets allowed on the Pod?
templates.content: We do not recommend pets in the bed during sleep, as this will affect the accuracy of the sleep data. Our Active Grid technology sits just below the top layer of the water mat, so if your pet's claws are long, there is some risk of the damage to the cover which would not be covered under our product warranty. If your pet will be sleeping on the bed, it is especially important to keep their claws trimmed. We also suggest having them sleep on top of a comforter or heavy blanket to reduce the risk of scratching through the top surface, as well as protect them from any sensitivity to heating/cooling.

templates.name: Does the AquaTru Reverse Osmosis Filter system produce Deuterium-depleted water?
templates.content:
No, the AquaTru doesn't remove deuterium; it removes all contaminants, but is unable to remove an isotope of hydrogen. The process to remove deuterium is quite expensive, as it can't be filtered from any water purification system. There are actually only 4 plants in the world that have the ability to remove it. Unfortunately, since this is a highly energy-intensive, expensive process, DDW has previously only been available to elite athletes and others who could afford it, but we're happy to now offer Qlarivia deuterium depleted water to everyone -
\https://water.attn.tv/sl/qTTzmNN4

templates.name: What are Locking Tuners?
templates.content: The difference between the locking tuners and non-locking tuners is that locking tuners have a clamping mechanism to lock the string in place. Locking tuners are most beneficial for guitars with a tremolo, as the strings are locked to the tuner. This reduces the amount of string slippage and will better keep the guitar in tune when using a tremolo.

templates.name: How do I set up my mattress?
templates.content:
Setting up your mattress is easy! Simply take the mattress out of the box and lay it on the front of your bed frame. Carefully unwrap or carefully cut the plastic cover to allow for decompression of your mattress. This can take a few minutes to fully decompress.

Note that while the majority of decompression occurs within the first few minutes of unboxing, decompression does continue for up to 24 hours after unwrapping.

templates.name: How often should I wash my hair when exercising with tape hair extensions?
templates.content: Ideally, you should wash your hair with tape hair extensions every 3-5 days to remove any build-up of sweat and oils from your hair and scalp and help to keep your extensions looking their best. If you exercise regularly, you may need to wash your hair more often, since excessive sweat can also cause the tape to loosen. If you find that your hair is looking greasy or feeling heavy after exercise, try washing it that day.

templates.name: Is Stevia an artificial sweetener?
templates.content:
Stevia is not artificial. It's sourced from the Stevia Rebaudiana leaf using cold water extraction methods. There's a lot of misinformation about Stevia being unhealthy, so we wrote a blog post to try to discuss this if you're interested in reading it: https://www.truelemon.com/blogs/tc/the-down-low-on-stevia-is-it-an-artificial-sweetener  Some stevia products are made from a process that uses chemicals in the extraction or refinement of their stevia which is why some people may consider those to be artificial. However, we use only Non GMO stevia that is guaranteed a minimum of 95% pure, which is some of the highest in the industry.

In addition, we source our rebiana only from reputable companies that do not use chemicals in the extraction or refinement of their stevia, and use only water-based extraction methods, which are safer for both our customers and our environment.

templates.name: How are bully sticks made?
templates.content:
The bully sticks are cleaned and sorted in a refrigerated facility to ensure safety. They're then hung vertically from racks and cooked in an oven to ensure that they are bacteria-free and safe for consumption. Hanging the bully sticks vertically removes most of the moisture from the product. The longer that they are dried, the less odor they have. We offer both odor-free bully sticks and regular bully sticks. The difference in how they are made is that the odor-free bully sticks are dried longer, lessening the moisture in them.
 
After drying, we sort and cut our bully sticks according to our sizing chart. Our high-quality products are consistently measured by hand for thickness. The thicker the final product, the longer it will typically take for a dog to consume.

templates.name: What's the differece between Excellent, Very good, Good, Fair and Vintage items?
templates.content: Excellent means minimal wear based on the age of the product. Very Good means minor wear based on the age of the product and it may include minor blemishes and/or dent(s) on the casing. The screens are clear when powered on. Good means moderate wear based on the age of the product but there are clear signs of usage and it may include blemishes and/or dent(s) on the casing. Fair means heavy signs of usage. Includes multiple dents and blemishes and it may have technical limitations and you can read the product listing for specifics.  Vintage Products are fully functional, but no longer run the latest OS and may not be compatible with newer features and software.

templates.content:

Video can be set from the Menu > Camera Mode > Video or Photo + Video. When the camera is set on Video, every 5s or 10s the video will be sent. When the camera is set on Photo + Video, a video will be taken after each photo but only the photo will be sent. templates.name: What are the washing instructions?
templates.content:
We recommend washing your sheets in cold water with a gentle detergent. We strongly recommend not using bleach or dryer balls. All of these tend to break down the bamboo fibers, creating pilling, discoloring, or other adverse results.

The sheets can be tumble dried on a low heat setting. Promptly removing the sheets directly after the dry cycle is completed will help reduce wrinkling. Be mindful of any lotions or skin care products containing strong ingredients (for example: benzoyl peroxide or salicylic acid) as this can often lead to bleaching or discoloring.

Please check the product tag on your Cariloha product. Some products may have a unique washing instruction, like the Cariloha Duvet Comforter.

templates.name: What is the difference between a threshold delivery and a white glove delivery? Which items include white glove delivery?
templates.content:
Oversized pieces such as beds, sofas, and cabinets are delivered white glove, meaning the delivery agents will bring the piece into your home and in the desired space (up to one flight of stairs). Once they have set your piece down, they will unpackage it for you and haul the packaging away.  

Smaller furniture pieces such as nightstands, side tables, stools, and chairs are typically delivered by a method we call threshold, meaning the pieces are just brought into your entryway and left as-is. This method does not include unpackaging, assembly, placement into the desired space of your chose, nor packaging removal.   

Only oversized furniture pieces are currently delivered with white glove delivery. Please feel free to contact our Customer Experience Team at support@mcgeeandco.com, by phone at 385-380-4446, or via the chat feature on our site if you need any clarification on how your piece will be delivered!

That being said, we do have a spreadable rodent repellent powder that has been tested on rats and we do recommend it for rats. You can learn more about it here: https://www.grandpagus.com/products/rat-mouse-powder-rodent-repellent?variant=40063174049869

templates.name: How do I clean my shoes?
templates.content: You can clean them easily using a water-based soap, and the one we recommend is Dr. Bronner's pure-castile soap. Simply run your shoes under warm water, then scrub them with a soft sponge. When you're done, rinse them off and let them dry in a well-ventilated area - they will be good as new.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: Please start your return here: https://vessi.com/pages/return-or-exchange

templates.name: How do I wash the hats?
templates.content: We recommend hand-washing our hats with a mild soap, and laying it flat to dry. Be sure not to use bleach on it, and definitely don't wash it in the washing machine!

templates.name: How do you clean the Weekenders?
templates.content: You can throw those in the washing machine and wash them on cold. Don't tumble dry, instead leave them to air dry. Wash on their own and not with other items, and keep in mind that white styles do require a little extra TLC to keep them in tip-top shape.

templates.name: How does the waterproof membrane work
templates.content: They're 100% waterproof, sand proof, snow, and slush proof, as well as windproof - and it's not a coating! Through research and hard work, we were able to develop a proprietary waterproofing technology called dyma-tex - a special knit made with millions of teeny, tiny holes in the membrane layer allowing for water in vapor form (sweat) and heat to pass through while keeping water molecules (which are too large to pass) from seeping into your shoes. This means the element-proofing will last the lifespan of your shoes!

templates.name: How long are your laces?
templates.content: They're 101.5cm.

templates.name: How long do you shoes last?
templates.content: Ultimately, it depends largely on the use and how you care for it, but our shoes should last you a really long time. We've had excellent reviews on the quality and durability of our shoes.

templates.name: How long does exchange / returns take?
templates.content: As we take extra measures to make sure our shipping facilities and partners are safe, please note that your returns or exchanges may take us slightly longer than usual to process, around 10-14 business days. We appreciate your patience.

templates.name: How many times can exchanges be made?
templates.content: The same shoe can be exchanged twice before it's considered final sale. For example, if you get a blue shoe, you can exchange it for a green one, and then you exchange it for a red pair. That red pair is then considered final sale and can't be exchanged or returned.

templates.name: I have latex allergies. Are Vessis ok for me?
templates.content: Oh no, sorry about that! If you have a latex allergy, our shoes may not be right for you since the midsoles are made out of EVA rubber, and the outsole is made of rubber. There is a chance that you would have similar reactions to the rubber material.

templates.name: I have Plantar Fasciitis, do your shoes have good support?
templates.content: Our shoes come with low arch support because they're a casual/lifestyle product. If you're looking specifically for arch support we might not be the best option, but that said, our insoles are actually removable, so you can always swap them if you want.

templates.name: If it's waterproof, how does that affect sweat absorbance?
templates.content: Thanks to our waterproof membrane that we developed called 'Dyma-Tex', the membrane has millions of pores small enough to block outside water like rain, slush or snow but large enough for heat and moisture to escape! So sweat is able to escape while still keeping your feet dry from rain and water.

Also FYI, the Everyday Moves actually provide a slight boost in arch support, and additional cushioning and padding along the arch zone and the in-step portion of the shoe. Out of all our styles, the EV Moves provide the best arch support.

templates.name: The ankle opening is really tight/ They're hard to put on

Not to worry, after a few more wears the opening will have loosened up to become the perfect fit for you. We recommend a shoehorn in the meantime.

templates.name: What is the difference between all the styles?
templates.content: The Cityscape is our lightest sneaker with a minimalist design that transitions you from work to play. It's designed with a tapered and slim silhouette. Our Everyday sneaker is your everyday go-to that's created with a chunkier midsole for additional lateral support and a higher laces cage for more footbridge support. Our Everyday Slip-on is easy to put on, and take off. We threw out the laces to get you out the door quicker. It's super lightweight, and great for packing into your carry-on! The Weekend has a slightly more relaxed fit compared to the other collections, it feels sturdy with less compression. They're all very breathable and comfy, you can't go wrong.

templates.name: What is the shoe made of? / What materials does it use?
templates.content: It is made from Dyma-tex, our patented, 100% waterproof, breathable knit that will keep your feet cozy all year long - cool in the summer and warm in the winter. The outsole is made from rubber, the midsole is compression EVA and the insole is made out of foam.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Everyday and the Everyday Move?
templates.content: Our Everyday sneaker is your everyday go-to. It's created with a chunkier midsole for additional lateral support and a higher laces cage for more footbridge support. On the other hand, the Everyday Move is designed to get you moving out there. With more breathability, all-day comfort, and added support, the Moves are perfect for those days where you're feeling adventurous.

templates.name: What's the grip like on the shoes?
templates.content: We added two-zone rubber herringbone tread design to increase frontal grip on the Everyday's, as well as side-to-side traction on wet surfaces. Our Cityscape's have a three-zone rubber tread designed for lightness and grip for both the city and light adventures. If you want the best grip, we recommend getting the Weekend sneakers! These are the strongest design of the bunch, made of full-length EVA rubber, making it the most slip resistant shoe.

templates.name: Can my child eat directly from the pouch?
templates.content:
Feeding directly from the pouch on their own will depend on their ability to hold the pouch with two hands, and handle squeezing the pouch to let out just enough to get a manageable mouthful at a time (and not squeeze the whole pouch into their face or on the high chair tray). 

Typically, around 9-12 months babies will be able to grip the pouch with two hands as they would a cup. And typically it isn't until 12-18 months until they learn the grasp and release milestone. We recommend feeding purees by spoon as much as you can, this helps them to learn how to use a spoon.

templates.name: Do you use Erythritol in your products?
templates.content: Please be assured that we do not use erythritol in any of our products. Instead, we either use stevia and cane sugar (1g for our Lemonades/Limeades/Iced Teas and 2g for our Kids) or just Stevia (in our Energys).

templates.name: Do I need to refrigerate any products after opening them?
templates.content:
Yes, we recommend refrigerating the flapjack and waffle box mixes once they are opened to preserve freshness. You're probably not used to refrigerating a box mix, but most other box mixes aren't made with freshly-ground whole grains like ours. Refrigerating freshly-ground whole grains is a great way to preserve their rich flavor and nutrition. Once opened, we advise that they are best to consume until their sell-by date. 

We also recommend refrigerating your Kodiak Syrup once the bottle has been opened. An unopened bottle has a shelf life of two years. Once opened, we advise keeping it for no more than 3 months.

templates.name: How do I manually send a test picture?
templates.content:
After you finish programming the camera, in Setup mode with the live preview window showing (before you enter the menu), with the camera connected to the cellular network and showing signal bars, press "ok" to take a picture and press "ok" again to send. You should see the camera go through Setting...Sending...Sent. 

If the camera stuck on Setting, it's usually an indication that the camera doesn't have a good data connection. You can confirm by performing a Hello Test (Menu > Wireless > Diagnostic > Hello Test). If the Hello Test is failed, please double check the data service on your device. If the camera stuck on Sending, please replace the SD card and try again.

templates.name: Is using water in fragrance diluting the fragrance? Why is water used?
templates.content: Water is added to fragrance solutions so that the total VOC (volatile carbon) content does not exceed 77.1% to comply with Californian regulations. Water dilutes the alcohol, which can be harsh and drying on skin. In addition, the fragrance can smell more pleasant as the sharp smelling alcohol is reduced. The evaporation of the fragrance from the skin may also be reduced compared to alcohol alone, thereby increasing lasting power.

templates.name: How do I use my Ruby Love?
templates.content:
Before your first wear, give your Ruby Love style a quick stretch. If using a pad, remove the adhesive release paper and press the pad firmly into the Ruby Love gusset, like you would in your normal underwear. If using a pad or our double-sided pad, pull the dri-tech mesh around the edges of the pad. Smooth with your hand until pad is flat.

Then pull your Ruby Love style up snugly to your body. For proper protection, rotate your double-sided pad, change your pad, tampon or menstrual cup with regular frequency. The dri-tech mesh helps prevent side, front, or back leaks.

templates.name: What if my No Show Sunscreen is pilling, what do you suggest?
templates.content: Apply the product in a single direction blending outward and upward from the center of your face. Pilling can also be caused by other products applied in combination. For best results, allow each skin care or treatment product time to absorb/dry down into the skin before applying the next product. Apply No-Showâ¢ after the products in your skin care regimen have absorbed/dried down. After No-Showâ¢ has dried down, follow with your makeup regimen.

templates.name: How long will the metal finish last?
templates.content: Our finishes are thicker than the industry standard and very durable, however, they are susceptible to wear depending on the conditions they are subject to. Some of the worst conditions are presented by lotions, perfumes, and sweat all of which are acidic, and will deteriorate the finish at an accelerated rate. Showering and swimming will also affect how a finish wears.

templates.name: Oru Kayaks versus Inflatables
templates.content: Oru Kayaks have many advantages over inflatables. Oru Kayaks need a quick wipe down with a towel after use, then you can fold them up until next time. Inflatables need to dry out for a day after use to prevent mildew. Oru Kayaks cut through the water and track like a dream due to the rigid hull. Inflatables often have poor tracking and can be difficult to paddle. If you want to go fast and stay on course, choose the smooth maneuverability of an Oru. Inflatables always have a risk of puncture, so rocks and boulders pose a risk. Oru Kayaks have an extremely tough hull made out of corrugated plastic, and while we also recommend avoiding sharp rocks and boulders when possible, our boats are designed to handle bumps and scratches along the way.

templates.name: What are SigmaTech Fibers?
templates.content: SigmaTech Fibers are our exclusive selection of high-performance synthetic fibers engineered to outperform traditional animal hair. It features technologically advanced filaments with specialized tips developed to hold and deliver cream and powder products without any absorption into the bristles. Built to last, SigmaTech fibers are antibacterial, hypoallergenic, and will maintain their original shape and color even after multiple washes.

templates.name: Are items all shipped frozen?
templates.content: Our products ship frozen and thaw in-transit. We do not ship out with any ice or cooler packs. They will be ready to eat when they arrive. Our products can be out of the freezer for several days, which we use for shipping purposes. During summer we ship a max of 2 days and in winter shipping 3+ days depending on state and climate. If you choose not to enjoy the order immediately, you would simply re-freeze and consume by the best by date on the box.

templates.name: Weight limit for your bikes
templates.content: We don't test or calculate the ultimate weight bearing property of our bikes. The adult bicycles have been used extensively by riders in the weight range of 200 to 300 pounds and 200 to 250 pounds for an Ebike. We don't have usage info on riders over 300 pounds or 250 pounds for an Ebike. Typically, it's the dimensions of the individual that makes our product uncomfortable or unusable, not the weight.

templates.name: How long until I see results from the serum?
templates.content: The clinical studies that we did with the Energy Serum showed results immediately after application for hydration, but over 24 hours, the product showed no decrease in efficacy even after one use. This was for elasticity, hydration, and skin plumping. With the addition of the Cryodrop, results improved even more, showing level increases at around 40%.

templates.name: How does the soap/shampoo bar dish attach to wall?
templates.content:
Here are the best practices for ensuring a secure attachment of the soap dish:

1. Rinse the suction cups with warm water.
2. Dry the suction cups.
3. Attach the suction cups to the soap dish.
4. Clean and dry the wall. Make sure to use a completely smooth surface.
5. Push the suction cups against the wall by adding pressure for about 10-20 seconds
6. Slowly remove the dish.
7. Press the cups to remove the air bubbles.
8. Slowly re-attach the dish.

You may check the following videos for the instructions.
â¢ How To Prepare the Suction Cups: https://mykitsch.attn.tv/annPcXsOIwwS
â¢ How to Attach Soap Dish to the Wall: https://mykitsch.attn.tv/aexCqzhKJ1XU

Following these steps should help ensure a firm grip and keep your soap dish securely in place.

templates.name: Are your vitamins FDA approved?
templates.content:
The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) regulates prescription and over-the-counter drugs, not dietary supplements. Kerotin Vitamins are natural dietary supplements and 100% drug-free. No dietary supplement can claim FDA approval.

However, our vitamins are manufactured in the U.S. in FDA-certified facilities that adhere to the requirements of the United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and adhere to Current Good Manufacturing Practices (CGMPs) to ensure safety and quality.

templates.name: How do I cook with Made In Stainless Clad cookware?
templates.content:
Generally speaking, our recommended heat range for stove cooking is low to medium heat. Since our pans have layers of aluminum in the core, our pans are quite conductive. If you are used to using less efficient heat conducting pans like some non-sticks or cast iron, you may be used to overheating your pans. Overheating your pan can cause damage like heat blush or warping and is not necessary with premium cookware like Made In. It will also cause oil or food to burn to your pan, making cleanup an unnecessary pain.

Never leave a piece of cookware on heat for an extended period of time, especially if the pot or pan is empty. This can cause severe damage such as thermal shock and even warping.

Do not add salt until your water is boiling. Salting your water early can cause pitting, which will not affect the performance of your cookware, but can affect the cosmetic appearance of the pan. For more on cooking with your stainless steel, check out our blog here: https://madeincookware.com/blogs/cooking-with-stainless-steel

templates.name: Which vitamins are water soluble?
templates.content: Water-soluble vitamins are those which are excreted from the body in urine. This means it's important to take in an adequate daily amount. Key water-soluble vitamins include Vitamin C and the Vitamin B family. These are often called 'essential' vitamins, as the body can't store or make them, and must take them in from diet.

templates.name: What happens if I remove the gas capsule before the capsule is empty?
templates.content: If you remove the capsule before it's empty, all the remaining gas will release with a large burst. It'll feel very cold, and you may see some frost bits release from the system. This is a normal reaction for a release of pressurized gas into the air and is harmless however it can be startling. That is why it's important to always check the gas pressure indicator before changing the capsule.

templates.name: How do I cook with Made In Carbon Steel?
templates.content:
Carbon Steel is a great workhorse for any kitchen! It's much more heat reactive than cast iron cookware, so you'll find that it gets hotter much quicker and you'll typically use less heat than you might be used to.

When you first start cooking with Carbon Steel and develop your seasoning, we recommend cooking foods high in fat, like red meats. Save more delicate meals like fish and eggs until you have a well-developed patina. With every use, you'll see your seasoning develop further and your Carbon Steel's performance will only improve!

Lastly, if you aren't already, preheating your pan is a great habit for any users of Carbon Steel, just like with cast iron or Stainless Clad cookware. Start your pan off on low heat for a minute before adding your oil or fat, and then slowly move to your desired temperature before the rest of the ingredients go in the pan.

templates.name: How is Rhino on hills and slopes?
templates.content:
Rhino is great on hills and slopes. Every Rhino is equipped with a 750W Bafang motor, which when coupled with our 25 amp controller, gives a peak output of 1200W. This powerful combo gives you the extra torque you need to make it to the top of any hill. 

Of course the speed in which you go uphill will vary a lot, depending on how much you use the throttle vs. the pedals, the weather, the terrain, and also how much weight is on the bike.  And for the downhills - every Rhino comes with 2-piston hydraulic brakes, which means you can stop quickly and easily (even if you're going fast!).

templates.name: Is NIRA Laser technology clinically tested and proven?
templates.content:
Yes! In order to obtain FDA clearance, rigorous clinical testing was conducted on 76 individuals of all genders in an independent, blinded study by New England Dermatology Associates overseen by three medical experts. The study assessed the NIRA laser's effectiveness and safety as the participants used NIRA for 2 minutes a day over a period of 90 days.

Our technology is unparalleled with no observable adverse effects on darker skin tones, nor any interference with skin melanin levels, making it the only laser device suitable for all skin tones. Furthermore, our laser devices are proven to deliver long-lasting results, as 7 out of 10 users maintained their wrinkle reduction benefits for up to three months after their treatment ended.

templates.name: Is the Spartan Helical LSD a good all-purpose Limited Slip Differential?
templates.content: Yes! Your ride will drive better than ever because both wheels will receive traction. When things get hot the Spartan Helical LSD will limit wheelspin across the drive axle by permitting the axle shafts to spin at different speeds while continuously trying to balance the application of torque between the two axles. This results in transferring more power to the wheel with the best traction. This improves vehicle control and performance. Mashing the throttle, taking a tight corner aggressively, or working through loose gravel or challenging sections of trail will actuate the unit's gear array to increase your traction.

templates.name: What is Butylene glycol used for?
templates.content: Butylene glycol is included in formulas for shampoos, conditioner, lotion, sunscreen, anti-aging serums etc, because it adds moisture to the hair and skin. It also works as a solvent, which means it keeps other ingredients such as dyes and pigments from clumping up inside of a solution.

templates.name: How do I take proper care of my case?
templates.content:
Our cases are manufactured with the best ink and printing quality available in the market. In order for you to extend the life of your case to its maximum, we strongly advise you to follow the following tips:

- Wash your case at least once a week: use sponge, running water and mild soap.
- Avoid placing it near greasy places.
- Avoid placing it near places with excessive heat and prolonged exposure to the sun.
- Do not use alcohol to clean your case.

templates.name: Can I exercise during and/or after fasting? How should I ease back into my exercise routine?
templates.content:
While exercise can help use up available blood glucose and move a person into a ketogenic, fasting state, vigorous exercise can stress the body and we do not recommend intense exercise during ProLon. So, while fasting, keep your activity light and do things like walking, yoga, and stretching.

Listen to your body as you ease back into exercise after fasting. If it feels like it's too much, it probably is. Don't push yourself too hard and keep the intensity at a manageable level. Remember, your body needs to recover after fasting, so it may take a few days for you to get back to the level you were at before the fast.

templates.name: What is NKRO?
templates.content: NKRO refers to N-key rollover. A keyboard with N-key rollover can register as many keys as you can press at once without "dropping" any characters. This means that no matter how fast you type or game, a NKRO enabled keyboard will keep up. Many low end keyboards can only register up to 6 key presses at a time. Most of our keyboards are NKRO enabled.

templates.name: What is a marking spray and how do I use it?
templates.content: A marking spray is a high-temperature activated epoxy with a ceramic pigment in the suspension. It gets applied like spray paint, dries, gets lasered onto a metallic surface, and the excess gets wiped off.

templates.content: Yes, you can use glue and tapes to secure your wig but it may cause additional wear and tear when used daily. We do offer a PU lining that can be installed to any wig to help protect the integrity of the wig if you prefer to use glues or tapes. We advise to only apply glues and tape directly on the PU area.

templates.name: How do I use the Dental Flossers?
templates.content: To use the floss side, hold the handle and guide the flosser between teeth, moving it gently in a back-and-forth and then up-and-down motion. To use the pick side, place the pick between the teeth at the gum line using a gentle back-and-forth motion to loosen food particles and plaque.

templates.name: What is Clairvee?
templates.content: Clairvee is a once-daily oral probiotic and is an easy, safe, and hormone-free way to rebalance your vaginal microbiome. It reduces odor, itching, and discharge all month as it targets the primary cause, not just the symptoms. After 15 days of intake, the Clairvee probiotic blend begins to colonize in the vagina, balancing its microbiome and returning vaginal pH to a healthy level.

templates.name: Warranty policy
templates.content:
JAXXON has been a trusted jewelry brand for over five years, with over 30,000 5-star reviews. We believe in our products and guarantee you'll be satisfied by backing your purchase with our manufacturer warranty. 

From design to production, every product is inspected to ensure durability and shine that will withstand everyday wear. However, if any damage or breakage occurs, we offer a 60-day warranty exchange from the date of purchase to take care of your product. Please feel free to contact us at contact@jaxxon.com or 213-663-1585 with any questions! 

Please note our warranty does not cover any lost or stolen items or jewelry that has been handled by third-party jewelers. Only items purchased directly from our website are covered by our warranty. International orders are not eligible for warranty coverage at this time.

templates.name: Are JAXXON chains made with real gold and real silver?
templates.content: Many of our chains are made with 14k gold and 925 sterling silver. We also use other premium-quality materials in our designs to offer luxurious chains at every price point. You can learn moreabout our materials here: https://jaxxon.com/our-materials

templates.name: How do I return/exchange?
templates.content: To initiate a return or exchange, please visit our Returns Portal: https://ordersupport.jaxxon.com/#/ If you need further assistance you can start a live chat with one of our experts or email our customer support team at contact@jaxxon.com.

templates.name: Restock
templates.content: We are restocking different products throughout the next couple of weeks. You can also sign up on the product page for restock notifications. Is there anything else you like?

templates.name: How do I untwist the Cuban link chain
templates.content:
We have created a video to assist customers in getting the kinks out of their Chain. To check out our video tutorial on how to untwist the Cuban link chain please click here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OXo_qo5_y94
 
I hope this helps! If you have any other questions feel free to ask.

templates.name: What is the difference between gold bonded vs gold plated?
templates.content: The diffence between gold-bonded and gold-plated jewelry comes down to the amount of gold and its durability. Gold-plating is typically an inexpensive way of adding a very thin amount of gold to a base metal. Our gold-bonded chains are crafted by coating a 925 sterling silver chain in solid 14k gold and finishing it with an antioxidant solution to preserve its brightness and durability.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: We firmly believe that JAXXON's success is tied to the success of our affiliate partners. Our affiliate program offers access to exclusive deals and opportunities to earn commission! Learn more and sign-up to be a JAXXON affiliate here: https://jaxxon.com/affiliate

templates.name: Bracelet size chart
templates.content: You can find our bracelet size chart on each product page.

templates.name: Can I get my chain wet?
templates.content: Our materials are specifically chosen for their durability, so that you can wear your JAXXON chain every day. You may get your chain wet, but we recommend drying your products as soon as possible with a cloth towel. Like all precious metals, to maintain lasting shine and durability you will want to keep it away from harsh chemicals.

templates.name: How do I care for my JAXXON chain?
templates.content: Our jewelry is made to last, so wear often and keep your jewelry in a microfiber pouch or our JAXXON jewelry case to keep oxygen at bay. Pat dry with a cloth towel after getting wet and use our Jewelry Cleaning Kit to maintain your jewelry's beautiful shine.
