templates.name: How does the Refer a Friend program work?
templates.content: What you'll need to do is share your unique referral link with your friends via FB, Twitter or email, and when a friend buys something, you get 500 Popov Points! Your friend gets 20% off their first order, though please be advised that for the order to be a referral, it has to be made from their own account and email address.

templates.name: Engraving specifications
templates.content: Engravings will always be made on the front bottom-right corner of our products. We use Times Roman 26pt font and each letter is about 2-4 mm wide x 4-5 mm tall.

templates.name: Does the AirPods case works on the AirPod pros?
templates.content: Unfortunately, the AirPods pro won't fit in the case, since these are 0.40" bigger than the original one.

templates.name: Need to ask my manager
templates.content: That's a great question! I'm not certain on the answer so I'm going to shoot Ryan a note to make sure I get you the right info. Since it is the weekend, he might not get back to me until Monday. I'll be in touch soon!

templates.name: Will the iPad sleeve fit an iPad 12.9 5th gen with magic keyboard?
templates.content: I'm afraid the keyboard won't fit in the sleeve with the iPad, it would be too thick to accommodate.

templates.name: What animal skin is used in your Horween Leather Wallets?
templates.content: We use cow skin.

templates.name: Where in the belt do you put the holes?
templates.content: When making a belt we take the size provided with the order to determine where the middle hole (4th hole) of the belt will be. There are 7 holes 1" apart so you have some give on either side, as well as 5" from the last hole to the tip of the belt. Please keep in mind that we never use the total length as reference.

templates.name: Can I use the AirTag case for different devices? / What is the internal dimensions of the AirTag case?
templates.content: The AirTag case will fit anything that measures 1.26'' in diameter.

templates.name: Can I use my Tile Pro with the AirTag case?
templates.content: I'm afraid the AirTag case won't work with the Tile Pro - it's bigger at 1.65'' tall and wide, while the inner compartment of the AirTag case is only 1.26'' in diameter.

templates.name: Which of your sleeves will work with my Surface Pro 6?
templates.content: Since the Surface pro measures 11.5â x 7.9â x 0.33â, it should fit in the Medium Sleeve (8.5" wide x 11.6" high x 0.2" thick). If you want to add the keyboard, you may want to consider the larger version, which measures 9.7" wide x 12.4" high x 0.2" thick. That said, I would recommend checking the total dimensions of the Surface Pro + keyboard to make sure they'll fit!

templates.name: The color of my items are different/darker than others I ordered.
templates.content: That's actually normal as leather will age by getting darker. This is why it's quite impossible to compare the same leather months or years apart. The accumulation of dirt, body oils, sunlight and wear and tear create a darkening and soft sheen to leather goods. New items might be darker or lighter at first, but will always evolve by developing a dark sheen. Your new items will get as dark as your older ones within a few months from now.

templates.name: Can you engrave belts or watch straps?
templates.content: We can't offer engraving on our watch straps and belts for technical reasons. The surface of the strap is too small to be etched properly.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Everything we make is crafted with careful attention to detail and our goods are made to order. Order ships in 1-3 business days, and then delivered in 3-7 business days to the US and Canada. International orders are delivered in 8-11 business days. All shipments going to the USA are managed by USPS, while orders to Canada ship with Canada Post.

templates.name: The color of my item is different compared to your pictures/website.
templates.content: This is normal, as the skin of each animal will absorbs dye differently. Therefore, each item will be different. Some items, for example, will be made with a darker English Tan, others with a lighter one. Some have lots of shading and natural markings, while others have almost none. This is the beauty and the uniqueness of the leather and the reason why we are unable to guarantee an exact color. Also, although our products are shown through images and descriptions as accurately as possible, every monitor or phone screen is calibrated differently.

templates.name: Do you use staples in any of your products?
templates.content: I can assure you that we don't and never use staples in any of the products in our collection, we don't even carry staples in our workshop.

templates.name: It's a family/cultural/superstitious tradition to put money in a wallet being given as a gift. Can I pay extra for you to do this?
templates.content: While we respect the traditions of all people and cultures, I'm afraid this is something we are unable to accommodate at this time.

templates.name: I have a suggestion/feedback about a new product you should consider!
templates.content: That's awesome! I recommend submitting your idea directly on our website, this is the best way for us to get people's input, as well as to improve our products! You can do so using this link: https://www.popovleather.com/pages/suggest-a-new-product

templates.name: Does the matte black hardware on your apple watch bands also contain nickel? I have an allergy.
templates.content: No! It's brass coated in PVD.

templates.name: Does your leather desk/mouse pad have backing or lining?
templates.content: There's no backing or lining on our desk pad and mouse pad. The back of these products is the reverse of the leather (flesh), which is non-slippery.

templates.name: Are your products hand or machine-sewn?
templates.content: The majority of our products are hand-sewn. We use machine for our bags (Tote + toiletry bag) and iPad sleeves only.

templates.name: Is the RFID blocking of the Wallet Gauntlet strong enough to protect all the cards in my wallet?
templates.content: It will only protect cards that are put behind and/or on front of it.

templates.name: Will the card slots shrink over time if I don't use cards on them? Mine have started to fall out of them!
templates.content: The initial fit of our wallets is intentionally designed to be tight at first, but will loosen up with use. As an organic material, leather gets more supple and tends to stretch with time. This is why you can add more cards in each slots after a little while. If you remove some cards after using your wallet for a few months, for example, the leather will keep is shape. Unfortunately, leather doesn't usually shrink.

templates.name: More info on Leather Patina
templates.content: Patina is what forms on natural materials such as wood, denim, canvas, metal and stone. Leather patina is what makes full-grain leather stand apart from its cheaper counterparts such as âgenuineâ or âtop grainâ leathers. From the scratches and marks your keys make on your wallet to the darker spots on your journal cover where your hand always touches and rubs. Leather Patina is something developed through everyday use. You can read about it in detail here: https://www.popovleather.com/blogs/from-the-workshop/what-is-leather-patina

templates.name: Can you do engraving or stamping on desk pads?
templates.content: We can't provide engraving or stamping on desk pads.

templates.name: Do you do custom watch strap sizing?
templates.content: Unfortunately, our watch straps only come in one size at this time. We're unable to do custom sizing.

templates.name: Will my (currency) fit in your Traditional Wallets?
templates.content: We're not too familiar with the dimensions of your currency, though the back pocket of the wallet measures 8cm high x 19.5cm long. I recommend measuring your bills to make sure they fit.

templates.name: Are any of your watch straps compatible with a Fitbit 'versa'?
templates.content: Our watch straps don't fit the Fitbit Versa, unfortunately. The watch has a specific type of pin that can't be accommodated with our bands.

templates.name: Tracking shows delivered, but they didn't get it
templates.content: If your tracking information shows that your package was delivered but you can't find it, please check all potential delivery locations at your address. USPS may have placed it in a secure location out of view of the street, or away from potential weather hazards. I would recommend checking your mailbox within the next 48 hours, as some packages come separately from regular mail or may show as 'delivered' but yet to arrive. You can also contact them directly to see if they can provide more information regarding your shipment. Please follow up with us by email at hello@popovleather.com if you haven't received your order within a couple of days, we'll be more than happy to help you further!

templates.name: Can you put extra holes in your Dog Collar? (when customer has a puppy or small dog)
templates.content: Unfortunately, we can't add extra holes to our collar as we use a die-cut design to cut the holes + tip of the collar. When making a collar we take the size provided with your order to determine where the middle hole (4th hole) will be. There are 7 holes 1" apart so there's  some give on either side. If your dog's neck is about 7", a 9" collar should be fine as they'll be able to use the two smallest holes at first (7" and 8") and then grow into it.

templates.name: Is the desk pad leather vegetable tanned?
templates.content: Heritage Brown is a full-grain Dublin leather, which took about three years to develop. It's derivative of Essex vegetable-tanned leather but in waxed versions. Distinctive to Dublin leather is the high oil content and ability to age with a beautiful patina. Because of this leather's versatility, we've been able to use it to create eye-catching essentials!

templates.name: Is the desk pad leather in natural vegetable tanned?
templates.content: The Natural is a Chromexcel leather, which is a pull-up leather "in full aniline, hand rubbed finishes." This type of leather first goes through vegetable tanning, then the chrome-tanning process.

templates.name: Have one of your notebook covers and it developed a really large fat deposit that cannot be rubbed away. how to clean/remove the fat from this area?
templates.content: Leather soaks up everything in its environment, so what you see is your cover aging and developing a patina. To keep leather in good condition, use some leather cleaning when you feel it's necessary. This will remove grease from dirt, dust, and oils absorbed through using your product. The cleaner should have a neutral pH and exempt of alcohol or abrasives. Don't use regular soap as this can dry it out and cause cracking. We recommend lexol and chamberlain's leather cleaners. Once your leather has been cleaned, apply the leather conditioner which will add moisture and keep the surface soft and supple. The balm will also stop natural oils and moisture from escaping leather. The patina will continue to evolve, but cleaning and conditioning will definitely help protect it. Whether you strive for wear and tear or take the utmost precautions with your leather; patina is inevitable.

templates.name: Is there any difference in how durable the chromexcel and the derby leather are?
templates.content: The durability is the same between both types of leather which should last a lifetime. Natural and Black are Chromexcel, while the Heritage Brown and English Tam are Derby and we use those two types of leathers mostly for the look. ET and HB show marking, marbling and scarring more so than the other two colors. Natural and Black are a lot more smooth but show "pull up" really well.

templates.name: Care Instructions (Sweaters, Crotchet, Mesh)
templates.content:
You should dry clean only. Store your sweaters and knits folded in a dry, ventilated area away from direct sunlight to preserve their shape and fabric integrity.
Avoid storing your knitwear on a hanger as it can cause stretching.
For long-term storage, store your sweaters in an airtight container to protect from dust and moths.
Pilling will occur naturally and can be removed with a special pilling comb or fabric shaver.

templates.name: Fabric Content
templates.content: We carry a variety of colors and prints and it is possible that some items fit different than others due to the fabric content. Most solid colors are 72% Nylon/28% Spandex, while some prints are 76% Polyester/24% Spandex, the Selenite Collection is 96% Nylon and 4% Spandex. The Sustainable Soul Collection is 82% recycled plastic bottles and 18% Spandex and it runs a bit smaller due to the fabric content. The Graphics are made of 76% Polyester and 24% Spandex and also run a bit smaller. The Sweetheart Midi Leggings are 82% Polyester and 18% Spandex.

templates.name: Do Your Seat Covers Come with a Console Cover?
templates.content:
The answer depends on the seat cover line and the specific pattern for your vehicle. Here's a breakdown by product line: Custom SeatSaver Seat Covers Designed for durability and everyday protection while being machine washable. Console covers are only included on bench style seats like 40/20/40 Bench, 50/50 Bench, 60/40 Bench, 40/60 Bench, etc... Bucket seats do not come with a console cover. 

Custom PrecisionFit Seat Covers Tailored for a premium, snug fit and most are foam-backed for extra comfort. Console covers are typically included for both bucket seats and bench seats. In some cases, certain console designs are too complex to be covered. 

Custom Marathon Seat Covers Built tough for work and adventure and machine washable. Console covers are usually included for both bucket seats and bench seats. In some cases, certain console designs are too complex to be covered. Ready-Fit Seat Covers Universal-style fit for quick protection. Do not include console covers. 

Sheepskin Seat Covers Luxurious comfort and style. Do not include console covers for bucket or bench seats, but a matching console cover can be ordered separately.

templates.name: Are these just like the other masks on the market?

Our patent-pending dÃ©colletÃ© patch has a tapered 3-D design that can be used cumulatively for over two weeks' time, and with our other shape collections, you can apply the patches as needed and can get over a week of wear with proper patch care. Please remember, that daytime use can also contribute to patch reusability. If you find that you are having trouble keeping on the patch during sleep - try using for a few hours before bed or upon waking up in the morning. templates.name: Differences between the Blaze LTE model and the Lion brand
templates.content:
Lion's a great brand! The Blaze LTE model is a very comparable brand to Lion, and there are a few differences between them - here are the main ones:
 
1. The cooking grates are a little beefier on the Blaze and have a shape that's great for sear marks. 
2. The flame tamers that come with the Lion are the teepee style that only cover the burners, whereas the Blaze has full-width flame tamers to help with vaporizing drippings and preventing flareups. You can upgrade the Lion flame tamers to ceramic rods, though, for an added cost. 
3. The Blaze LTE has knob lights and interior lights, and Lion only has them on the inside. 
4. The Blaze has a lifetime warranty on every component of the grill with the exception of the ignition components and electrical, where as Lion's warranty varies a little for each part.

The Blaze is a little pricier but we think it's worth it! They also have all outdoor kitchen components. If you're interested in putting a package together and possibly getting a discounted price, give our customer service team a call at 1-866-523-0527 and we can get a quote for you.

templates.name: How much dye should I use?
templates.content: The amount of dye that you use will depend on the color you're trying to achieve. For lighter colors, use less dye; for darker colors; use more. You can test the color of the wax by dripping some out onto a paper plate (or something that would not be damaged) and letting it cool. It's always a good idea to start out with just a little. You can always add a little more to darken it, but it's difficult to lighten the color once the dye is added. For the liquid dyes, you may start with 1 drop per pound for light colors, but not go over around 7 drops per pound for darker colors. The dye blocks can color anywhere from 5 - 25 pounds per block depending on the shade you're trying to achieve. Instructions for the liquid dyes can be found on the backs of the bottles. For the dye blocks, you can purchase a laminated copy of the dye block color chart for guidelines on different shades.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Ingrown Concentrate and Ingrown Eliminator Serum?
templates.content: Our Ingrown Concentrate is an oil and our Ingrown Eliminator Serum is a serum. The concentrate has a thicker consistency made for sensitive skin and has a dropper applicator. It's a daily preventative treatment that can be used immediately after hair removal. It's formulated with excellent ingredients like coconut oil for its hydrating and nourishing properties as well as tea tree oil for its antibacterial and healing properties. On the other hand, the serum has a thinner consistency and has a spray applicator. It's an intense treatment not suitable for ultra sensitive skin and should only be used 24 hours after hair removal. It's formulated with wonderful ingredients like willow bark extract to clear pores and prevent inflammation as well as lactic acid for exfoliating and toning properties.

templates.name: Do I need a tray?
templates.content: Trays are used to catch excess urine over time as the lawn saturates. When your dog initially pees, it won't go straight through but will be absorbed into the grass. Over time, as the grass absorbs urine, it will get full and start to seep through the bottom. That is where the tray comes in! It protects floors if the grass is in your home or on a balcony. However, if you use the grass outside as a dog run, for example, the tray may not be necessary.

templates.name: What is a "damp rating"?
templates.content:
A "damp rating" means a fixture has been deemed suitable for a damp location. A damp location is an exterior or interior location that is normally or periodically subject to condensation of moisture in, on or adjacent to the electrical components of a lighting fixture or ceiling fan.

Please note, damp-rated fixtures should not be used in areas that are directly exposed to water whether it be rain, snow, or shower spray. Products that are damp-rated say "Suitable for Damp Locations" on their product page under Product Details.

templates.name: Opus: What does the â+â in â41+ adjustable settingsâ mean?
templates.content:
Opus has 41 settings on the outer adjustment ring, which can be seen when looking directly at Opus. This ring can adjust between numbered settings from 1 to 11. Between each numbered setting are 4 minor increments, allowing you to set your grind setting by increments of 0.25. With this setup, there are technically 120 positions on Opus.

Underneath the load bin is a blue ring that allows you to get between the 4 minor increments in the outer ring. That's what we mean by "41+"!

templates.name: What are Nickel Silver rivets?
templates.content: Nickel Silver is a copper alloy with nickel and zinc. The usual formulation is 60% copper, 20% nickel, and 20% zinc. Nickel silver is named due to its silvery appearance, but it contains no actual silver. Nickel Silver is non-magnetic.

templates.name: How should I wash my items?

However, please note that Bamboo is a natural fiber and is delicate; so should be washed separately from items that may be damaging, like towels, hardware or Velcro. For the longest wear, you can wash them inside out and line dry when possible.

templates.name: How is my Sizzlefish order packed?
templates.content: We pack your products carefully in a reusable, recyclable cooler containing plenty of dry ice. The individual portions or packs within the cooler are vacuum-packed. Your fish items should arrive hard-frozen, and all you need to do is transfer them directly to your freezer. There may be some remaining dry ice in the bottom of the shipping cooler, beneath the shipping pad that is under the fish items. templates.name: When is the last minute deadline to send an invitation to my wedding?
templates.content:
The general rule here is to send out your save the dates 4-6 months before the wedding and your invites 6-8 weeks before the wedding date. However, this can change based on your guest list and the location of your wedding - if you are having a destination wedding, you'll want to send both of these a bit earlier.
 
Also, it's always best to confirm with your venue when they need your final headcount -- this can also move around when you send out your invites.

templates.name: What is luxe lotus jersey?
templates.content: Our Luxe Lotus Jersey clothing is made from Elevated Lotus Jersey (ELJ) fabric which is a luxe fabric sourced from Japan. Its luxurious nature is characterized by the way the Suvin cotton is spun. As the cotton yarn is spun, the excess fibers are sheared off creating a clean and smooth texture that mimics an ultra-soft, matte satin-like handfeel. This allows the face of the fabric to have a slightly polished look, ideal for transitioning the clothing piece from day to night.

templates.name: What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it? - brand specific
templates.content:
If the tracking information indicates that your items have been delivered to the address provided on the purchase but you have not received it, please check surrounding houses, doorsteps etc.. in case another home received it by mistake. Speak with any other tenants such as family, roommates or landlords etc. in the event they received it on your behalf. The package may also have been left with property managers, an apartment office or your local postal provider.

Also, sometimes USPS marks packages 'delivered' before actual delivery and it should appear within a few days.

templates.name: What is Wovenaire?
templates.content: Wovenaire is a patented cushioning material that replaces foam, latex, and springs and it's the core of all our mattresses. Wovenaire is 90% air by volume - which makes it incredibly light and, well, airy. In addition, Wovenairee is made with hypoallergenic materials, and it is the most hygienic sleeping surface for your little one because it's completely washable. templates.name: Can I remove the product from the capsule/softgel and take it that way?
templates.content:
If a product is an enteric or time release formulation, you may lose these special features by removing the contents from the capsule or softgel. This might also leave some nutritional supplements vulnerable to stomach acidity. Others can cause stomach upset or other discomforts without the protective coating. You could potentially lose about 20% of the contents when removing from the capsule or softgel.

Some supplements may also irritate the oral mucosa. For example, we don't recommend taking cayenne out of the capsule and putting it in a smoothie.

templates.name: Why do you use AAA Cubic Zirconia?
templates.content: AAA Cubic Zirconia is a type of man-made gemstone that looks a lot like a diamond. What's great about AAA cubic zirconia is that it's considered to be high-quality, so it has a lot of things going for it. For one, it's really clear and sparkly, just like a diamond, so it reflects light really well. Plus, it's super durable, which means it won't get easily scratched or damaged, even with everyday wear. And the best part? It's more affordable than diamonds, so you can get that sparkly, high-quality look without breaking the bank.

templates.name: Did you change your ingredients? Your ice cream tastes different than it used to
templates.content:
Over time, as our ice creams have come to be available in grocery stores across the country, we have seen what can happen to ice cream on the shelves of a grocery store with a "challenged freezer" in the heat of the summer. The answer: Nothing good. Our dilemma was how to protect our ice creams from the realities of supply chain - on the way to customers' home freezers while continuing to make our ice creams using the finest ingredients.

We came up with a solution that's truly unique in our industry. We've formulated a combination of Dairy Protein Concentrate and a small amount of Tapioca Starch. The Milk Protein Concentrate is a by-product of micro-filtering the proteins from raw milk. What you get is concentrated protein and the Tapioca Starch is a fine powder made from the dried, ground-up pulp from the root of the cassava tree. We've run countless tests, across every one of our flavors, for taste, texture, consistency and the like. We are over-the-moon excited about this development. The ice creams are actually better. Creamier, smoother, more consistent - and everything we'd hoped for!

templates.name: What's the difference between your 2 vacuums?
templates.content: It will actually depend, the WPPO one is battery-charged so you won't need a socket nearby for you to be able to use it while our own brand of vacuum has a 2.5m long power cable. There are 3 nozzle attachments (aluminum nozzle, a plastic nozzle and a brush nozzle) for the WPPO one which can suit to a variety of uses while ours features a 1-meter long hose that can easily fit through the areas where you need to clean your grills. Lastly, the WPPO has a 20L capacity while our own brand has 15. So ultimately, it will be up to you depending on your grill placement, what you'll be using it for, how much ash you'll be cleaning, and a couple of other factors. But both are great cleaners so you can't go wrong with either!

templates.name: Can I mix ARMRA Colostrum in a HOT liquid (coffee, tea, etc)?
templates.content: We don't recommend adding ARMRA Colostrum to anything hot. Many of the living, bioactive nutrients in ARMRA Colostrum are heat-sensitive, so adding ARMRA to a hot beverage denatures these compounds and negates its efficacy. We recommend taking ARMRA Colostrum by either pouring the unflavored powder directly into your mouth or mixing our powders with your cool/lukewarm beverage or food.

templates.name: How fast should my in-line blowers run?
templates.content: Your inline fan should match the flow rate with the internal exhaust fans (100CFM) if you're leaving the internal fans in place to prevent back currenting into the mainboard. Alternatively, you can remove the internal exhaust fan altogether, but do not exceed 600 CFM as this could affect the accuracy of the laser motion system.

templates.name: How much weight can one expect to lose, and will the individual be able to keep it off?
templates.content: While the purpose of the ProLon diet is to trigger rejuvenation, weight loss may occur. Everyone is different, and weight loss depends on a number of factors. In a clinical study of participants who completed a 5-day ProLon cycle once a month for three months, the average weight loss at the end of the study was about 5.7 pounds. This was primarily abdominal fat, while lean body mass was preserved.

templates.name: What's the difference between the glue and the tabs?

The Removable Nail Tabs are meant to be used when you want to use the nails for a shorter amount of time, but at most, about 5 days. They are also very easy to remove and don't leave any residue or cause any damage to your nail.

templates.name: Difference between Wavetech Foam and Wavetech Cream
templates.content: Wavetech Foam and Wavetech Hydrating Wave Cream can be used together or separately depending on your hair needs. Wavetech foam was designed for all hair types to enhance and define your natural wave pattern. Wavetech cream was designed to compliment the foam by adding hydration and extra frizz control for dry or unruly waves and curls. For maximum definition, I recommend using these products together. Wavetech cream doesn't have as much hold as the foam, so it's better as a stand alone product if you have wavy to curly hair. templates.name: The mouse product did not work/I put the pouches and found mice/mouse
templates.content:
We are sorry to hear that the pouches aren't working for you, but we can help you out. We very often find that our customers would like help with their mice problem first so they can get rid of their mice. Can you please tell us more about where you tried using the pouches? We can provide you with the following tips as well:
 
- We suggest not putting baited traps in the same area as the pouches. The bait counteracts the pouches.
- It's always smart to wash the area where the mice/mouse have been active with soap and water. This will eliminate previous scents that draw them to the area.
- Remove any food sources or baits and to plug entryways.
- Are you sure you have mice, or is it rats? Our Mouse Repellent Pouches are only advertised and guaranteed for mice. Our Rodent Repellent Powder is guaranteed for rats.

templates.name: What happens if my turtle hasn't moved?
templates.content: It's not uncommon for a transmitter to skip a couple of days or so due to the turtle's behavior or biofouling on the transmitter or antenna. Also, the satellite transmitters aren't always "on." The transmitters are programmed so that they are "on" for a set number of hours then "off" for a set number of hours. This helps conserve the batteries which power the unit. In order for a location to be collected, a satellite must be in "view" of the transmitter and the turtle must remain at the surface long enough to give the satellite time to receive a signal from the transmitter. So, several things must happen at the same time for a position to result. If the most recent point is more than two months old, then the transmitter is most likely no longer working. If you don't see an update in 1 -2 weeks, please reach back out.

templates.name: Does Litter-Robot require special litter?
templates.content: Litter-Robot simply requires clumping litter. We recommend a high-quality, standard-weight, clay-based clumping litter, such as our premium cat litter. Some silica gel litter beads and crystals can also be used with Litter-Robot, as long as they pass through the screen. Alternative, plant-based litters may also work, but these tend to form looser clumps that can cause condensation in the waste drawer. When using a plant-based litter, we recommend emptying the waste drawer and cleaning more frequently. Litters that do not work in Litter-Robot are the strictly absorbent, non-clumping or loose-clumping litters, newspaper-based litters, and absorbent wood pellet litter.

templates.name: Scent throw complaints
templates.content: I apologize that your experience with our product hasn't been enjoyable so far. There are a few reasons that you may be experiencing a more subtle scent throw than you thought would occur. The first reason is the soy wax itself - because we use natural soy wax, our candles will not have the same scent throw as paraffin candles. Soy wax is known to have a much lighter scent throw than paraffin or other wax blend candles. It's natural qualities can also lead to variances from batch to batch. Room size can also affect the scent throw - our products were initially created with small New York apartments in mind, so they might not be super strong in a larger house or room. A fainter scent throw could also be due to the cure time. If this candle was just recently poured, the fragrance may not have yet completely bound with the wax. If this is the case, you could wait a few more days before lighting it again. Lastly, our abilities to perceive fragrance vary wildly from person to person. Some people are highly sensitive while others lack the ability to perceive certain scent notes. In order to create a balance, our fragrances are meant to work for all kinds of people.

templates.name: How do I clean Made In Carbon Steel?
templates.content:
Similar to cast iron, you don't want to put your Carbon Steel pan in the dishwasher or use soap on it as this will strip the oils in your seasoning. Instead, use coarse salt and a rag or boil some water in the pan to free more stubborn stuck-on food.

Start by wiping out any excess oil from your pan, using coarse salt to free any stuck-on food. This will keep your pan's seasoning intact. If there are pieces of food stuck to your pan, add a tiny bit of water to cover the bottom of your pan and bring the water to a boil over medium heat. Once the water reaches a boil, scrape at the food bits with a wooden or rubber spatula. Once your food is no longer stuck, dump out the water, and dry your pan thoroughly. Return your pan to the stovetop and heat it over medium-low to remove any excess moisture. Add a very thin layer of high smoke point oil or Made In wax to the pan, and spread the oil using a paper towel or dish towel all over the pan until it is evenly coated. Your pan is now clean and seasoned!

templates.name: Can I overcharge the battery?
templates.content:
Our battery chargers are equipped with a temperature and voltage cut-off technology. This means that if the battery is exposed to high temperatures or power surges, it will shut off automatically.

We do not recommend leaving your battery on the charger for long periods of time (e.g. several days). This is because over time you can reduce the overall battery capacity. It's better to charge it for up to 24 hours at a time.

templates.name: What is the best way to care for my fabric and upholstered furniture?
templates.content:
It's important to vacuum your items on a regular basis with a brush attachment if available. To keep pillows and cushions looking and feeling good, fluff and rotate them on a weekly basis. Pilling is a normal occurrence as short or loose fibers on the surface of your furniture tangle together. It's more common to occur on areas that experience more friction. You can obtain an inexpensive fabric shaver (not an everyday razor) at fabric and big box stores to remove them.

Blot spills immediately with a clean, colorfast towel or sponge. Please see the specific cleaning information on the product for specific instructions based on the fabric type.

templates.name: What is the difference between the Defi system and the airless dispenser?
templates.content: An airless dispenser prevents any entry of air and prevents the oxidation of the product like the D.E.F.I system. However, a "dead volume" still remains at the top of the airless dispenser; this "dead volume" contains some of the product. This means there's a contamination risk for the product: preservatives have to be used. In the D.E.F.I system, there is no dead volume and no contamination is possible. The formula is 100% sterile and remains so for the entire duration of the product's use.

Do not leave your glasses in your car or in a hot garage, as excessive heat causes acetate to wrap and flex out of alignment. Don't lay your glasses face down or expose them to chemicals or rough textures. Do not expose your lenses to sunscreen, soap, or other abrasive substances.

templates.name: Are you products clean/non-toxic?
templates.content: All of our ingredients are non-toxic, clean and made for sensitive skin in mind. That means no harmful ingredients are included in our good light world. These include parabens, BPAs, phthalates, mineral oils, oxybenzone, microbeads, mercury and a whole lot more.

templates.name: Are your products cruelty-free?
templates.content: Animals are our friends and we must protect them at all costs. Our products have no animal-derived ingredients or byproducts including musks, oils, fats, and we are proud to say we're Leaping Bunny certified.

templates.name: Are your products vegan/sustainable?
templates.content: Each of our products are gentle, clean, cruelty-free, vegan, with 100% sustainable packaging. All of our packaging is made of recyclable materials such as pp polypropylene, glass, soy based ink, mixed paper, and cardboard.

templates.name: Are your products 100% recyclable?
templates.content: From the beginning of our brand we wanted to ensure that we source materials that have the opportunity of being recycled. While the manufacturing industries aren’t 100% there, we’re heartened to know there’s been a big priority when it comes to sustainability and packaging. Our products are sourced from glass, PP (polypropylene plastic), of MPP (elastomer + PP). Our serum pump is the first patented no metal spring pump that can be fully recycled without being broken down. We’ve also opted for soy printing whenever possible, which ensures that all printing on labels can also be recycled.

templates.name: Are you products fragrance-free?
templates.content: Yes! All of our products are formulated to be without artificial or synthetic scents.

templates.name: Are your products good for sensitive skin?
templates.content: Our ingredients were chosen specifically for sensitive skin but we didn’t stop there. We sent all of our products for thorough testing at CPT Labs, the elite testing service that’s become an industry standard. Each of the vigorous trials were patch-tested in what’s called RIPT testing. Patches with our products were applied 3 times a week for 9 applications on several people from different backgrounds and age groups. From a scale from 0 (no visible skin reaction) to 4 (severe), good light products tested at 0. The testing concluded that our products indicated no potential for dermal irritation or allergic contact sensitization.

templates.name: Are your products gluten-free?
templates.content: Our products don't include gluten or gluten-derived ingredients. We do use xanthan gum as a safe stabilizer in our We Come In Peace serum. It's not known to have any reaction with those who have celiac or gluten sensitivities but certainly something to look out for. To be extra safe seek out medical professionals to ensure this is a product you can 100% use.

templates.name: Is this an Asian/Minority-Owned Business?

templates.name: Is this for all genders? / Can men use your products? / What does “beauty beyond the binary” mean?
templates.content: We're gender-inclusive and create a new space in the market for those who don't quite shop beauty by gender. Our formulation ethos is all about creating a more robust skin barrier with products that will hydrate, plump, nourish, and repair.

templates.name: How is my purchase giving back to TCU? / Do you support charities?
templates.content: We set aside 1% of sales to support charities doing work within gender communities across the spectrum.

templates.name: Why should I use good light? How are your products different from other brands?
templates.content: We create highly efficacious, yet gentle personal care products that are for all people regardless of your gender identity or sexuality. These products were formulated for all skin types, especially those with sensitive skin, and we truly think they do the most. Our cleanser, for instance, can be used as a moisture mask, it contains beta glucan, hyaluronic acid, seaweed, and more to ensure your skin is supple. Our toning lotion can be used to gently slough dead skin cells, nourish the skin, and allow it to soak in that delicious moisture. Our serum will help with skin cell turnover thanks to bakuchiol (a retinol alternative!).

templates.content: I checked your cart and some items you picked are only stocked in the US and we don't have the logistical bandwidth to stock and ship globally but don't worry, we have a solution. Read the instructions here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360035622631 Hope this helps!

templates.name: Are your bags pick pocket proof?
templates.content: We have pick-pocket “proof” zipperpulls but they are not cut proof. That being said, having straps and zippers slashed off of them is a concern that our customers have had for years, but we have never heard of one instance of this actually happening.

templates.name: Is the plate a universal arca Swiss plate?
templates.content: Yes, it is!

templates.name: Military / First responder / Student discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! Check out our military program here -  https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/msfr-discount The discount is 15% off :)

templates.name: How much can your tripod hold?
templates.content: Our tripod can stably hold 21lb set ups :)

templates.name: Can you use a gimbal head on your tripod?
templates.content: Yes, with the universal adapter head (sold separately) you will be able to use it.

templates.name: Do you ship to PO and APO boxes?
templates.content: Yes, we ship to both P.O and APO boxes.

templates.name: Tripod compatibility
templates.content: The travel tripod is compatible with many arca-compatible plates and L-brackets. Check this out - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360033431932--Using-the-Travel-Tripod-with-Different-Plates-and-L-Brackets

templates.name: What packaging do you use?
templates.content: It’s packaged in a recyclable poly bag that serves as the mailer :)

templates.name: What can fit in my bag? I have this gear, what would you recommend?
templates.content: We provide virtual shopping sessions and 1:1 gear fittings. Check out these links: https://calendly.com/peak-design-flagship/gearfitting?month=2020-08 https://calendly.com/peak-design-flagship/pdvirtualshopping?month=2020-08 :)

templates.name: Let me check on that for you
templates.content: Let me check with someone on the order management team. Hang tight! :)

templates.name: Will your strap work with xx camera?
templates.content: Absolutely! Our straps use a connection system called anchor links, which allows them to attach to any camera or device with strap loops or eyelets. Individual anchors can withstand over 200lbs of force and are made of a thermoplastic cord that is highly abrasion resistant. Check this out - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/203702175-Anchor-Strength-Anchor-Wear-Anchor-Engineering for more about anchor strength and engineering :)

templates.name: Ask my manager - CS FU
templates.content: I'm going to check with one of my more photography-savvy colleagues to make sure I get you the right answer. I'm relatively new around here and still ramping up my product knowledge. It might take me a couple of minutes to get back to you, is that alright? :)

templates.name: Is everyday bag carry on approved
templates.content: Both our 20L and 30L are approved for carry-on by all major airlines. They can also fit under airplane seats. Though it would be best to check with your airline just in case :)

templates.name: Issues with anchors and compact cameras
templates.content: We are aware of this issue where strap eyelets are too small for the cord on our anchors. You can try a couple of things - 1. Thread it through with tweezers, pliers, or dental floss which works surprisingly well! 2. If your eyelet is still too small, try using a split ring (https://www.amazon.com/Hama-Split-Rings-Triangular-027902/dp/B00006JCX6#customerReviews) to connect the anchor to the eyelet. Your camera should have come with these or your can get them from a local store or Amazon. Attach the ring to the eyelet, and then attach the anchor to the ring. We're still researching how we can make our micro anchor cords skinnier while retaining the same strength, and we’re even considering making custom split rings for this purpose! In the meantime hopefully one of these solutions will work for you :)

templates.name: Recommendation for split rings
templates.content: Here’s a link to split rings we recommend from Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/Hama-Split-Rings-Triangular-27902/dp/B00006JCX6/ref=sr_1_1?dchild=1&keywords=B00006JCX6&qid=1599372847&sr=8-1

templates.name: Where can I buy external stowage strap for travel line
templates.content: You can get it from here: https://www.peakdesign.com/products/replacement-external-carry-strap

templates.name: Does the ball head on the travel tripod work for other tripods?
templates.content: No, our ball head only works on our tripod.

templates.name: What is the length of the shell?
templates.content: Approximate shell lengths are 8" for the small one, 9.5" for the medium one, and 11.5" for the large one. You can see more info here - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/205337315-Choosing-the-Right-Size-Shell-For-You

templates.name: What is the handle drop length on the tote bag?
templates.content: The drop length for the v1 toteof handles is approx 12" :)

templates.name: Dimensions of the 3L sling bag flex folder
templates.content: The approximate dimensions of it are 19cm x 15cm x .8cm (7.5" x 5.9" x .3") and no other ones will fit as they are custom made for each one.

templates.name: Recommendation for pan or fluid head?
templates.content: You can check this out: https://www.bhphotovideo.com/c/product/553886-REG/Manfrotto_128RC_128RC_QR_Micro_Fluid.html/overview

templates.name: Customer has no receipt available for warranty
templates.content: No worries! If you don't have a copy of your receipt, you can provide a photo of the damaged item next to a sheet of paper with the current date written on it, or write down the date you purchased and the location of purchase. It will serve as your proof of purchase :)

templates.name: Does embroidery void the warranty?
templates.content: It does not void the warranty :)

templates.name: Does your wallet have RIF?
templates.content: Not currently and we have no plans at this time unless backer censuses it otherwise throughout the campaign.

templates.name: How many cards can the wallet hold?
templates.content: Both wallet styles can hold up to 7 cards. :)

templates.name: Will the credit card sized tripod fit in your wallet?
templates.content: Yes, you could probably get the mobile tripod in your wallet, depending on the size. It will fit in our wallet, but the magnets might cause issues if you try to put cards in there too as there is no shield.

templates.name: Belt opening for field pouch
templates.content: The belt loop has about 2.25" opening.

templates.name: What's the difference between dual and standard plate?
templates.content: You can see the differences between all our plates here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201291383-What-s-the-difference-between-Capture-s-plates-kits-

templates.name: Is your lens kit compatible with Z mount for nikon?
templates.content: No, unfortunately it is not.

templates.name: Is the $8 fee per item or per order?
templates.content: It would be $8 per return, not per item.

templates.name: What type of charging cable does your car mount come with?
templates.content: It is available in charging and non-charging models. Charging model comes with 12V lighter plug adapter and easily-routable power cord. :)

templates.name: Will I still get lifetime warranty if I order the slide lite from Moment?
templates.content: Yes, you will! :)

templates.name: Can a Kirk L bracket mount to your Capture?
templates.content: It won't work directly but check this out: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201292143-Using-Capture-with-an-L-bracket

templates.name: How do I clean / wash my product?
templates.content: Check this out: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025917591-How-to-Clean-Your-Peak-Design-Product

templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 20L everyday backpack - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDB-20L-1.jpg?v=1595354699 The maximum laptop carry for the 20L is 15"

templates.name: Laptop/Tablet carry dimensions for the Travel Backpack 45L
templates.content: The maximum laptop carry dimensions are: 40.6cm x 28cm x 2.5cm (16" x 11" x 1"), and the maximum tablet carry dimensions are: 24cm x 19cm x 1.5cm (9.5" x 7.5" x 0.6").

templates.name: What are the differences in your straps?
templates.content: You can compare our straps here - https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/compare-straps to have a better view on which would work best for you.

templates.content: You can register your product here - https://www.peakdesign.com/apps/pd-registration

templates.name: Dimensions for all types of camera cube dividers
templates.content: The dimensions for all the camera cube dividers are 16cm (6.30cm ) x 20cm (7.87in) x 1cm (.39in) for the large divider; 16cm (6.3in) x 33cm (13in) x 1cm (.39in) for the small divider; As for the shelf divider,  L (blue line) 7.6" x W 2.8" x H (red line) 5.6";  long divider: L 13.9" x 5.9" H 6.1"; and XS divider: L 4.8 x H 5.6.

templates.name: Dimensions for all Everyday Bag Dividers
templates.content: Check out the dimensions of all our Everyday Bag dividers here - https://prnt.sc/w45qos

templates.name: Your anchor links won't work on my camera/split rings
templates.content: Our anchor links are designed to work with OEM straps or standard straps that terminate in webbing, not split rings. Like here: https://prnt.sc/wckbvu In theory you could attach the split rings at the end of your strap to the hole in the anchor links, but thats kind of a janky set up! If you like the look of a rope strap, there are lots of sellers on etsy that make rope straps with our anchor links - https://www.google.com/search?q=rope+camera+strap+peak+design+anchor+links&source=lm[%E2%80%A6]l=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwju7qKSlvTtAhVawJcIHT8zDogQ_AUoAXoECAEQAQ

templates.name: Will my lens fit into into your camera cube?
templates.content: Possibly, check out this link and you can measure it - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/products/camera-cube-size_1024x1024.jpg?v=1587924443  or give me your measurements and I'll check.

templates.name: Are your tripods sand/saltwater resistant?
templates.content: We recommend taking all components apart and thoroughly cleaning all sand from them with a "can of air" and then wiping down all components with fresh water. Check out this maintenance and tuning video as your guide - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360037879212-Peak-Design-Travel-Tripod-Maintenance-Tuning

templates.name: What generation is the Duffelpack 65L?
templates.content: There is only one generation of the Travel Duffelpack 65L and it came out on June 2019.

templates.name: Laptop/Tablet carry dimensions for the Everyday Messenger 13L
templates.content: The maximum laptop carry dimensions are 22.9cm x 2.5cm x 33cm (9" x 1" x 13") so it holds a 13” Macbook Pro/Laptop. The maximum tablet carry dimensions are 30.6cm x 22.1cm x .7 cm (12" x 8.7" x 0.3").

templates.name: Can I add a strap to the wash pouch?
templates.content: Unfortunately the wash pouch is not "strap compatible" but I'll pass this on to the design team for future consideration.

templates.name: The center column on my Carbon Tripod isn't in carbon fiber, why?
templates.content: We have actually switched to an aluminum center column on the carbon tripod due to stiffness and damping reasons. We had a Kickstarter update in Nov 2019, you can access the full video here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FFm-pFKrqIU

templates.name: With the Tripod, do you recommend mounting standard plates to larger zooms or directly to camera?
templates.content: Yes, you can have the plate on all of your large zooms, as well as camera for smaller lenses. Some folks attach the plate to their lens foot especially for large lenses to distribute the weight and achieve nice set up.

templates.name: Differences between the Aluminum and Carbon Travel Tripod
templates.content: Check out well detailed differences between both tripods here - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360033182911-The-Aluminum-Vs-Carbon-Travel-Tripod

templates.name: Will your Capture work with an L-Bracket?
templates.content: You can check this out for more clarity on that - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201292143-Using-Capture-with-an-L-bracket

templates.name: How strong is the magnetic connection between the universal adapter and the universal bike mount? Will it fall off?
templates.content: The connection between the universal adapter and the universal bike mount is both magnetic and mechanical. To fail, either the adapter adhesive would have to fail, or the mechanical parts would have to break. In short, the system is designed to support biking. It might fail/fall off in a serious incident like a hard crash.

templates.name: Are your products vegan/animal friendly?
templates.content: Most of our items are vegan, but here's a list to provide guidance if you don't want to buy PD gear that contains animal products - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003847783-Vegan-Animal-Friendly-Products

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free standard shipping for all US orders! :)

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG here https://www.instagram.com/peakdesign/ and FB here - https://www.facebook.com/peakdesignltd

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you? :)

templates.name: Cancel/edit order
templates.content: We actually factor in a 5-hour window from the time when the order is placed to when it drops to our fulfillment center for processing, just in case you need to change something. If you'd like to modify your shipping info or the contents of your order, the best way to do it is to cancel the order and place a new one. Please log in to your account to see if this option is available. Refunds generally take 2-3 business days to appear back on your credit card. You can log in to your account here: https://www.peakdesign.com/account/

templates.name: Where are your items made / manufactured
templates.content: All our products are currently manufactured in 2 factories. Our soft goods are made in Ho Chi Minh, located in Southern Vietnam and our hard goods are made in Dongguan, an urban and industrial city in China's Pearl River Delta.

templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: The best way to discuss wholesale is to email us directly at info@peakdesign.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship
templates.content: The best way to discuss this is to email us directly at info@peakdesign.com Our team is happy to chat.

templates.content: Here are the dimensions for the 30L Everyday Backpack - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDB-30L-1.jpg?v=1595354699 The maximum laptop carry for the 30L is 16".

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Sling 6L
templates.content: Here are detailed dimensions for the 6L Everyday Sling - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDS-6L-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum tablet carry is 11"

templates.name: Dimensions for the Everyday Sling 10L
templates.content: Here are the dimensions for the 10L Everyday Sling - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/Dimensions-EDS-10L-1.jpg?v=1589219151 The maximum laptop/tablet carry is 13"

templates.name: Will the camera cube fit into my everyday backpack?
templates.content: No, sorry about that! The camera cubes don't work in the ED backpacks, only the travel line.

templates.name: Do you send invoice/receipt with order?
templates.content: For domestic orders, no invoice will be sent. Just a packing slip without prices.

templates.name: Are the packing cubes washable?
templates.content: Yes, check this out for instructions on how to take care of them - https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025917591-How-to-Clean-Your-Peak-Design-Product

templates.name: Does the tripod come with a phone mount?
templates.content: Yes it has a built-in and stowable mobile mount.

templates.name: Cancel/edit order (outside 5-hour window or if "change order" button is grayed out for the customer).
templates.content: I can check if that’s possible. What’s the order number and email it's under? Can you please confirm the change you’d like to make?

templates.name: I have the Capture (v1/v2/v3), is it compatible with my (brand) plate?
templates.content: We actually put together a great article about this with detailed information on compatibility which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201291383-What-s-the-difference-between-Capture-s-plates-kits-

templates.name: How big/wide of a strap can I use with the Anchor Mount housing?
templates.content: Here's an image showing the measurements of the housing's openings which you can use to determine if the strap you're using will work: https://prnt.sc/18m232s

templates.name: Can the travel tripod be set up vertically?
templates.content:
The Tripod can be used to achieve a number of angles but you do have to rotate how the plate is engaged within the tripod to get to some of them.
See some more info and a demo from one of our Lead Tripod designers as he walks through some of these here https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360040053251

templates.name: Does the everyday hip belt fit the field pouch?
templates.content: The Field Pouch won't work with the Hip Belt but you can definitely use a regular belt.

templates.name: How many Camera Cubes fit into Travel Backpack?
templates.content: It can accommodate 3 different loadouts: 3 small cubes; 1 medium and 1 small cube; or 1 large cube.

templates.name: I have a (3rd party tripod) which of your plates will work for me?
templates.content: We actually put together a great article about this which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/201291333-Using-Peak-Design-Plates-in-3rd-Party-Tripods

templates.name: Will your bags keep my gear safe inside, in case of a drop?
templates.content: Even though our bags are made with compressed foam panels to protect items inside, they're not fully drop proof and proper care should still be taken to keep items inside safe.

templates.name: Do you offer delivery? / I heard about Cornershop, can you tell me more about it?
templates.content: We can indeed now deliver to your house from our Flagship Store in around 90 minutes if you're in the SF area! Prices are the same as what you'd see at the store, though please bear in mind that some store promotions may not apply. Also, Cornershop adds a 10% charge for its services that you will see as "service fee" at checkout. You can download the app here: https://web.cornershopapp.com/

templates.name: What is the weight difference between the carbon travel tripod and the aluminum travel tripod?
templates.content: The aluminum alloy weighs to be about 3.44 pounds/1.56kg and carbon fiber weighs about 2.81 pounds/1.29 kg.

templates.name: Warranty Policy
templates.content: It's our mission to make the best things. Not good, not great, but literally the best products in their respective categories. It is also our mission to not create any unnecessary waste. That is why Peak Design products come with a no-hassle, no-rhetoric lifetime guarantee. When you spend your hard-earned money on our gear, you can do so knowing it will remain fully-functional and defect-free. You can find more detailed information here: https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/warranty and start your claim here -https://peakdesign.typeform.com/to/XCow6x

templates.name: I heard that you have bundle deals. What are the mechanics?
templates.content: Our products exist in an ecosystem and when used together, you can unlock new functionality and benefits! We put together a great article with details on the mechanics of our Bundle Discount here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360024636751-Bundle-Discount-Rules

templates.name: Is the DWR finish on your tech pouch PFC free?
templates.content: Our bags are made with “C0” coatings which are PFC free :)

templates.name: What is the extra set of hex drive long bolt screws that came with my Capture for?
templates.content: The longer pair of screws are to use if you have a thicker bag strap! One pair of thumb-drive bolts clamp to any strap up to 1.5 cm  thick and one pair of hex-drive bolts which clamp to any strap up to 1.6 cm thick.

templates.name: Does the Everyday Case have a loop?
templates.content: It does! It offers a built-in loop for gripping and it's also worth noting that when not in use, the loop magnetically closes flush with the case, unlike other pocket-snagging grip accessories.

templates.name: I saw a review about how the rubber of the Slide and Slide Lite melts onto clothes while outside in the heat! Has this been taken care of?
templates.content: We were informed of cases like this and quickly released the newly upgraded Slide/Slide Lite. It includes a new silicone grip to address the previous issues and we've reached a point where all inventory we're currently selling have the updated strap with silicon grips.

templates.name: I want to return a gift I got! If I initiate an exchange using your returns center, will it notify the person who ordered the bag?
templates.content: You have the ability to return a gift using our returns center without notifying the person who gave you the present, but you have to actually go through the GIFT RETURN process, not fill out the “regular return” info as a customer would when returning. You'll see it below the red "Start Your Return" button and should appear as "Receive a gift? Start Here." For gift returns though, you must know the order # and the ZIP code on packing slip.

templates.name: At what speed does the Wireless Charging Stand charge?
templates.content: This actually depends on both the phone as well as the charger used, but generally phone manufacturers advertise their max charging power listed - Apple: 7.5 W (Requires charger that supports apple 7.5W fast charge) - Google: 11 W (Pixel 4 fast charge with any EPP charger, Pixel 3 fast charge with only Pixel stand) - Samsung: 9 W (Fast charge requires the a charger that conforms to Samsung's power negotiation standard).

templates.name: Can the 35L Travel Duffel be folded to fit into a suitcase?
templates.content: The Travel Duffel can indeed be folded and should be able to fit inside a suitcase.

templates.name: Is in-store pick-up available?
templates.content: Definitely if you're in the Bay Area you can buy it online and pick it up in-store during usual business hours. Just select "pick up" at checkout. Here's the store info: https://www.peakdesign.com/pages/flagship

templates.name: Laptop carry dimensions of the 20L and 30L Everyday Backpack
templates.content: The laptop carry dimensions of the 20L backpack are 38.1cm x 25.4cm x 2.5cm (15"x10"x1"), while the 30L backpack's are 40.6cm x 27.4cm x 3.8cm (16" x 10.8" x 1.5").

templates.name: Does the Field Pouch V2 have straps included?
templates.content: Yes, the Field Pouch v2 includes an external carry strap.

templates.name: How long is the charging cable for the PD charging stand?
templates.content: The charging cable is 2m or 6 feet :)

templates.name: What is the diameter of the screw used on the standard plate for the travel tripod?
templates.content: The standard plate screw is 1/4-20 :)

templates.name: Does your lifetime warranty still apply to products that have already been replaced with a warranty claim?
templates.content: I'm afraid a bag that has been “warrantied out” is no longer eligible for future warranty claims, sorry about that!

templates.name: Where is your flagship store?
templates.content: It's located at 529 Hayes St, San Francisco, CA 94102  and you can call the store directly at +1 415-707-4422 :)

templates.name: What is the length/width of the strap in the Field Pouch V2?
templates.content: The strap's length is 150 cm (59 in), while its width is 1.5 cm :)

templates.name: What's the difference between the Everyday line V1 and V2? (Everyday backpack, messenger, sling, tote, zip and totepack)
templates.content: We've made quite a number of improvements  and we are happy to share them with you! For a comprehensive view of the line, you can check this out - https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/2986/1172/files/EDLv2-WhatsNew-All.pdf?v=1583965053 :)

templates.name: Is the strap from the Field Pouch V2 compatible for use with the Tech Pouch?
templates.content: Yes, the strap from the Field Pouch V2 works with the Tech Pouch! :)

templates.name: Do star trackers work with the Travel Tripod?
templates.content: Some models are actually compatible with our tripod! You can either replace the ball head with our Universal Adapter Head, or could screw a plate directly onto that and then attach with the plate to the ball head :)

templates.name: Can I machine wash your bags?
templates.content: Please do not machine wash any of our bags, hand washing is the way to go! You can find more detailed info here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025917591-How-to-Clean-Your-Peak-Design-Product

templates.name: Do you do embroidery/personalization on any of your items?
templates.content: We currently only do customizations for wholesale company orders.

templates.name: Do you provide lifetime warranty if I purchase through Amazon?
templates.content: Your Peak Design product is guaranteed for life no matter where and when you bought it, as long as it's the genuine article. This includes peakdesign.com, Amazon, one of our retail partners around the globe, or our very own PD Marketplace, where you can buy and sell used PD gear.

templates.name: I returned an item, when will I receive a refund?
templates.content: Your return credit will be initiated as soon as your return is received and verified at our returns processing facility. Please allow 1-2 weeks for this process to complete in full.

templates.name: Mount/Accessory compatibility with MagSafe phones/cases
templates.content: Our soft-locking mounts and accessories (Tripod, Wallet, Charging Stand, Wall Mount, and Car Mounts) will work with MagSafe phones and cases.

templates.name: Does the Travel Tripod come with a case?
templates.content: Yes, it comes with a padded, weatherproof case.

templates.name: Can I sew/embroider patches and personalize your bags?
templates.content: You definitely can though you just need to be careful as we do have a poly coating on the bags that you can't get too hot or will melt, so it would be best to carefully sew on patches. This can also limit the weatherproofness of the bag as it will poke small holes in it.

templates.name: Can I carry the Travel Tripod using your (Peak Design bag)?
templates.content: You can! And we actually put together a sweet article with more details which you can check out here: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/360033177271-How-to-Carry-the-Travel-Tripod-in-Your-Peak-Design-Bag

templates.name: I noticed some water trapped/building up between the standard plate and my camera!
templates.content: This is actually due to the plasticizer in the PVC used in the plate pad and is inherent in this material due to the compression force on the plastic pad when attached to the camera. This should not affect the strength or the "anti-twist" nature of the pad and you should be able to easily wipe off with a cloth and/or a mild cleaner.

templates.name: Will the Everyday Case work with 3rd party chargers? / Does the Everyday Case work with Qi wireless charging?
templates.content: The best answer we can give right now is most likely and that it's our intent. It's nearly impossible to answer this question with certainty because there are many many models of wireless chargers on the market with a wide range of different architectures not to mention that we are currently undergoing a redesign of our magnetic array. Our current case design has shown to be functional with most 3rd party chargers and we expect this compatibility to increase with our redesign effort.

templates.name: I'm hearing squeaking in my (product), what do I do?
templates.content: You can actually try using WD40 to lubricate and address the squeaking, or try using a small amount of unused cooking oil or olive oil and apply it to the affected area.

templates.name: Does the motorcycle stem mount work as a normal bicycle stem mount, too?
templates.content: The motorcycle stem mount can't be used on bicycles stems, though this is something we'll definitely consider in the future.

templates.name: How strong is the car mount/chargers magnet?
templates.content: Our Car Mount has built-in magnetic attachment technology (called SlimLink™) is ultra secure. It holds your phone during even the bumpiest of rides.

templates.name: Will the magnets in your Mobile line mess with my phone?
templates.content: In short, no - your phone, and the stuff in it, will be fine and work fine. The longer answer is that we're designing our system such that the magnets will have no adverse impact on your phone's GPS/navigation, accelerometer, near-field communication (NFC), Bluetooth, wifi, internal compass, or any other technical doodad inside of it. This is our intended result, and we're carefully dialing in magnet spacing, strength, and shielding to make this happen. We haven't completed testing on it though, so we can't promise this across every phone or use case.

templates.name: Will the magnets in your wallet mess with credit cards and things in my wallet?
templates.content: In short, no, it shouldn't. We're in the midst of extensive testing to ensure your cards will be fine. We may not be able to prevent de-magnetization of older or lower-strength hotel key cards. So you'll just have to stay at nicer hotels from now on.

templates.name: Customer using phone that's not compatible with Everyday Case
templates.content: It's something we're definitely considering, though we don't have anything concrete in the works at this time. I'll be sure to share your suggestion with the design team as we make future updates to our product line and definitely appreciate the feedback!

templates.name: Can you dismount the Bike Mount using one hand?
templates.content: You can! It features a no-look, 1-handed phone attachment and removal design.

templates.name: I purchase online, can I return my order in-store?
templates.content: Absolutely! You can return the item(s) via our Flagship SF store free of charge without submitting the return online.

templates.name: Is the Car Mount's ballhead removable?
templates.content: The Car Mount's ballhead isn't removable.

templates.name: Can you clean the Everyday Case with antibacterial/bleach wipes?
templates.content: The case is made of a weatherproof nylon canvas fabric which is safe to clean with antibacterial wipes.

templates.name: What's the difference between the Stand Wallet and Slim Wallet?
templates.content: The difference is that the Stand Wallet has a precision-tuned, on-demand, fully-adjustable kickstand that holds your phone at any angle for optimal viewing, while Slim Wallet doesn't have it.

templates.name: Is the Everyday Case compatible with Moment?
templates.content: Our cases are not Moment-compatible, though this is definitely being considered by our design team! No plans to make compatibility a priority right now, but that could change depending on Kickstarter feedback.

templates.name: Does the Everyday Case work with the Apple Wallet? The alignment magnet is where the loop is and I'm concerned.
templates.content: Apple Wallet should work with the case, but it would indeed block the loop function. You can just remove the wallet to use and enjoy the loop functionality as needed though!

templates.name: When the version of the Everyday Case for a customer's phone does not offer the Loop variant and they want recommendations.
templates.content: Since the version of the Everyday Case for your phone won't be offered with Loop, you can use any third-party PopSocket, loop, or ring.

templates.name: Where do I start my return? / Returns Portal
templates.content: You can start the process here: https://peakdesign.happyreturns.com/

templates.name: Does the Everyday Case work with MagSafe?
templates.content: The Everyday Case brilliantly connects with MagSafe, it's totally fast and secure! Here's a great video to properly explain this - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NYqcIdpXaSE&t=2s

templates.name: Can the Everyday Sling be worn like a fanny pack?
templates.content: It's possible, but only with the 3L and 6L Slings. You can check out this video where there's a section on Waist Carry at the 9:18 mark: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tm7pufxVdGQ&t=558s

templates.name: Do you have plans to make a Dual Strap?
templates.content: Creating a Dual Strap is something we're considering, but nothing concrete is in the works as of yet. I'll be sure to share your suggestion with the design team though as we make future updates to our product line! Currently, here's what we can recommend when Carrying 2 Cameras: https://support.peakdesign.com/hc/en-us/articles/204949925-Carrying-2-Cameras?source=search&auth_token=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJhY2NvdW50X2lkIjozNjc3OTIsInVzZXJfaWQiOjM4MjA1ODE4NjA1MSwidGlja2V0X2lkIjo0MjUyOTgsImNoYW5uZWxfaWQiOjYzLCJ0eXBlIjoiU0VBUkNIIiwiZXhwIjoxNjM2NTA0MzE1fQ.hsTW5j1C8ZpFfU6NX3gX6Uue2eaLKaNkGAsxCiNHFZA

templates.name: Can you use the Car Mount with the Slim Wallet attached?
templates.content: It isn't something we recommend since the magnetic attraction won't be as strong due to the thickness between the 2 surfaces (phone and mount) if the wallet is in between them.

templates.name: I don't have a printer at home! Can you mail me a return label?
templates.content: We don't have a way to physically mail a return label, though we suggest having it printed at your local Post Office which should provide this service.

templates.name: Is it possible to use the Mobile Tripod without the case?
templates.content: You can, but only if you have a MagSafe-equipped iPhone which allows the Mobile Tripod to be used without the Everyday Case. Here's a video you can check out for reference: https://www.youtube.com/watch?

templates.name: Is the 65L Travel Dufflepack small enough for a typical airline carry-on?
templates.content: The 45L Travel Backpack (which we definitely recommend!) maxes out the carry-on dimensions of most airlines, however, the 65L is able to be rolled and compressed to 35-45L using the external carry straps, and as long as you utilize the roll up feature to make it close to the carry-on dimensions, it should actually be ok.

templates.name: How thick is the rear wall of the Mobile Everyday Case?
templates.content: The rear wall of our Mobile Everyday Case is 2.4mm thick.

templates.name: What's the maximum space the Travel Tripod can be deployed?
templates.content: The Travel Tripod can be deployed at a max of 51.6'' as noted on this link - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xV9Pcw0a0Jo&t=1679s It's at the 01:30 mark. To arrive at your desired length under this, you just have to adjust it to your preference.

templates.name: Will your Rain Fly work for the 20L Everyday Backpack?
templates.content: Our Rain Fly is actually designed for the 45L Travel Backpack and we don't recommend using it for the smaller Everyday Bags, however, we recommend something like this which should work with your 20L Backpack: https://www.rei.com/product/118866/rei-co-op-ducks-back-rain-cover-20-liters

templates.name: Are your bags waxed? / Do you make your own wax canvas for your bags?
templates.content: Our bags actually aren't waxed, the fabric is dipped in PU coating before they're made.

templates.name: How many packing cubes can the 35L Travel Duffel fit? It says 3 in the product page, but it isn't clear which ones!
templates.content: It can actually fit 3 small packing cubes, you can check out this video for more details:  https://youtu.be/rAhFQf9xyFA?t=354

templates.name: What are the uppers made of? - Pashion Footwear
templates.content: Our uppers are made of either patent leather (vegan-friendly) or suede.

templates.name: What material is the bottom of the shoe made of?
templates.content: The surfaces that touch the ground are rubber for grip and durability, and the midsole is an elastomer which allows the shoe to flex between flat and heel.

templates.content: Yes it is, and they only accept returns via mail so you'd have to follow our returns protocol on our website (click returns/exchanges on the bottom of our site).

templates.content: Yes, the flat cap is included and does not need to be ordered separately.
