templates.name: How do I manually operate the locks?
templates.content: Check out the tutorial here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1LSULSKIEik

templates.name: Can I add another iPhone as a key to lock and unlock the Haven as needed? Will I also need a hub and key fob?
templates.content:
Once you pair your first phone that will be the "master key". From there, you will be able to send anyone in your family an e-key. You can do so by clicking on the key icon in your app! 

Please keep in mind - once you send an e-key out, they will only need to accept the key and not go through the pairing process when you pair your phone directly to the app.

templates.name: Will it work on French doors?
templates.content: Yes! Our lock works great on french doors! Simply install the lock in the middle of the doors with an even catch of 1/4" of each door. Please let me know if there is anything else I can help you with!

templates.name: I lost my phone
templates.content: You can control HAVEN via your key fob or manually via the foot pedal. If you lose your phone, we advise you to unlink your phone from your HAVEN Connect via the online portal to prevent unauthorized access. If you are locked out of your house you can send an eKey to another user via the online portal and use that device to gain access. If none of these are an option for you, please contact support at (615) 538-5807.

templates.name: Do I need WiFi for Bluetooth Haven (haven connect)?
templates.content: Our HAVEN Connect bluetooth lock relies on bluetooth technology and does not need a WiFi connection to be engaged or disengaged! But there are benefits of using WiFi through our hub. Our hub lets you utilize various integrations like Alexa skills and Attack Detection as well as remote access outside of Bluetooth range.

templates.name: What size screw do I need for the installation?
templates.content: We recommend 2 3/4" screws at installation with a 3/16 diameter.

templates.name: Can I unlock the lock manually?
templates.content: You can easily unlock the lock by stepping on the lifted gate with your foot.  The gate may make a popping sound, and that is normal.  The gate will lower to allow the door to pass freely over the lock.

templates.name: Can my dog lock/unlock it?
templates.content: The locking pedal on the right wing of the lock cannot be activated by a dog.  It takes specific dexterity and force to press and engage this lock. We have never had an issue with a dog accidentally locking someone out. :)

templates.name: Steps to connect haven connect to work with Alexa?"
templates.content: Search for "haven lock" in the Amazon Alexa app in the skills section and enable the skill, then search for devices. Once you enable the skill, you’ll be asked to link your Haven account to Alexa. During the linking process, you have to give your Haven account username and password - not your Amazon or Alexa login credentials. Hope this helps! :)

templates.name: Can I pair both of my locks on one phone?
templates.content: Yes, you can pair one phone to multiple locks :)

templates.name: Will this work on sliding doors?
templates.content: Yes, it would! You can watch this video to properly measure and size your door with our kits. - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t69ueNIDt0c&t=184s

templates.name: How do I switch on Z-wave locks from sleep mode?
templates.content: When new z-wave locks are in a "sleep" mode, you can "wake" up the lock by quickly pressing and releasing the pinhole reset button on the lock. You will want to use a paperclip or a similar tool to perform this wake up action.

templates.name: Once escalated
templates.content: I am reaching out to our team now! This can take a few extra minutes since we're outside of business hours at this time, but hang tight, I'll be with you very soon :)

templates.name: What is needed to make Haven connect lock/unlock from anywhere in the world?
templates.content: In order to lock/unlock from anywhere in the world, you would need our Gateway Hub and Connect Bluetooth model. You will be able to lock and unlock your Connect anywhere you are connected to WiFi or cellular data. You can also create e-keys that will enable you to share access, schedule times of access of remote lock, or unlocking of your device. I hope this helps :)

templates.name: Can I use the Ring App alone with the Z-Wave lock?
templates.content: You could use our app and hub with our Bluetooth connect to access and engage the lock. But you cannot simply have the Ring app to use our Z-Wave lock. You will need the Sri g security base station to integrate the Z-Wave lock within the Ring app. Using the Ring app with a doorbell camera alone will not allow our lock to integrate with our Z-Wave lock.

templates.name: Where do I find the serial number on my lock?
templates.content: It will be underneath the lock or on the box located on a blue label with a barcode.

templates.name: I don't have my phone/ remote on me, can I unlock manually?
templates.content: Yes, all of our locks can be engaged and disengaged manually.

templates.name: Can I set up routines / automatically lock my Haven every day at a set time?
templates.content: Yes, you can set routines by connecting your lock to Amazon Alexa. You need to make sure you have our Bluetooth lock, and a gateway hub in order to make this connection to Alexa.

templates.name: Can I install the HAVEN Lock on top of the door as well?
templates.content: Great question! It's technically possible, but please be advised that we don't recommend our customers do this as this isn’t the way we designed the lock to work. We only advise installing the lock to the bottom of the door per its design.

templates.name: How to perform a factory reset?
templates.content: When performing a factory reset you will continuously hold down the admin button, press and release the paperclip pin hole reset button while still holding down the admin button, continue to hold the admin button down for another 10 or so seconds then release it. You will hear a chirp and an LED light sequence with the lock in about 30-60 seconds after this has been done. That will indicate your lock has been successfully reset.

templates.name: When will I get my refund?
templates.content: Once we receive your return at our warehouse it will be inspected and processed. It may take up to 3 weeks after we process the return for it to reflect on your account.

templates.name: What is the length of the straps that come with the grand view hammock?
templates.content: The straps that come with the grandview hammock are 78" long.

templates.name: How did you get your name?
templates.content:
Our name (actually pronounced Koala - Tree ) came about because the brand was founded on an organic farm out in Colorado that had a ton of eucalyptus trees on it and koala's love eucalyptus!
Also, it is a play on the word "Quality''.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: We ship with USPS and DHL. Once shipped, standard shipping is 5-9 business days, and international shipping will take 1-3 weeks depending on customs.

templates.name: How many layers are there in your masks?
templates.content: Our masks have two layers of cotton.

templates.name: Mask dimensions
templates.content: The dimensions are 8.5" long x 5.5'' wide at the nose x 3.5'' wide at the sides of the mask.

templates.name: Where is the knife made?
templates.content: The Haswell is made by Dylan Wanta, who crafts the blade and handle from start to finish in his workshop outside of Salt Lake City.

templates.name: Difference between regular and puffy kachula
templates.content: The main difference between the two is that the puffy one is insulated while the regular one is not. Both are about 48"x71" lying flat but in their pillow forms, the puffy is about 12"x12" and the regular is closer to 11"x6". Both are made with ripstop nylon and DWR treated as well.

Other than that, there are no other differences, they're still antimicrobial, DWR coated, etc. They're also sized slightly smaller so if you're on the fence about sizing, go for the larger size.

Upon placing your order, you will be presented with an estimated time frame in which our shipping carrier will contact you to schedule your delivery. Please note the estimated dates provided are for the arrival of your order to a shipping facility near you. Upon arrival, our shipping partners will reach out directly to schedule a delivery appointment.

templates.name: What if my items are on backorder at the store?
templates.content: If the items you purchased are on backorder, you will see an estimated time of arrival date instead of a date and time to pickup your order. When your items arrive in stock at the store you will receive a "Ready for pickup" email. If you have multiple items on backorder that come to the store at different times you can pick up as the items arrive or wait until your whole order is ready for pickup.

templates.name: How often can I do Prolon Reset?
templates.content: You can experience a 1-day fast to see if fasting is right for you, or use it whenever you feel you need a reset from overindulgence. You can use it to either amp up your cleanse routine by using it twice per week to optimize the benefits of the reset or incorporate into your intermittent fasting 5:2 Diet routine. Consistent with the duration of your 5:2 Diet routine, you can use it on your 2 fasting days per week and eat your regular diet for the other 5 days of the week. For example, if you choose to follow a 5:2 routine for 3 weeks every month, you would use 6 resets within that month.

templates.name: Can I use Complete Protein as a meal replacement?
templates.content: We don't recommend that you use complete protein as a full meal replacement on its own as there aren't enough calories to make it a meal. We recommend using it as a snack between meals or before or after a workout. Feel free to use complete protein as a base to a delicious smoothie and add in a variety of fresh or frozen fruits, veggies, superfoods, nut butters etc.

templates.name: What other products should I take with BIOHM Essentials Digestive Greens?
templates.content: Our BIOHM Essentials Digestive Greens can be taken with all BIOHM products but pairs well with our BIOHM Essentials Digestive Reds.

templates.name: Can I drop my return at your returns centre?

All parcels sent here via the United States Postal Service for us are grouped together and then forwarded on to our UK Warehouse for processing. This address will only accept parcels by post, not in person.

templates.name: Is the 20 oz Stainless Steel Cup insulated?
templates.content: The 20 oz Stainless Steel Cups are designed as single-walled stainless steel products. This means they do not have the same insulation properties as our other bottles, which are specifically engineered for superior temperature retention. The primary purpose of these cups is to serve as an eco-friendly alternative to plastic cups, rather than to provide insulation.

templates.name: Can the KP Body Scrub be used on sensitive skin?

templates.name: How Accurate is the DNA Test?
templates.content:
There's a pretty complex answer to the question, "How accurate is the DNA test?" so please strap in for all the details about our DNA test! :) The science behind our tests is extensive and complicated, but we fully stand behind the accuracy of our health markers in particular, and the breed portion may be just slightly up to interpretation based on your cat and the current breeds that we do or do NOT test for...

So, to fully understand the breed report, please first know that we are NOT a breed verification test, and often people look to us for this service that we ultimately do not provide. Our product is mainly geared towards mixed-breed, domestic kitties, and the report we offer allows you to see the breed breakdown within groups (Western, Eastern, Exotic, and Persian by percentage), and the likelihood of breed similarity based on your cat's genetic code, and which of those sections match with the breeds: https://www.basepaws.com/blog/list-of-breeds-basepaws-report/ that we test for.

For example, if your cat were perhaps a purebred Sphynx cat, our DNA test would not currently pick up on any Sphynx genes, so one may say that the report is 'inaccurate' for this type of cat. However, because cat breeds often share many genes and sections of their genetic code, the test would pick up on those genes between the Sphynx and any breeds that we currently test for. This is due to the history of intentional breeding of cats, so many breeds are relatively new in comparison to dog breeds. The remaining genes for the Sphynx cat would fall under our "Polycat" category.

For more information, please take a look at our e-books: https://www.basepaws.com/ebooks/, where our team has documented how we doing our testing.

templates.name: How do I use the Teeth Whitening Pen?
templates.content:
: Remove the cap from your Teeth Whitening Pen and twist the base to dispense a small amount of gel onto the brush applicator. Use the brush tip of the pen to paint the whitening gel onto your teeth. Avoid getting gel on your gums or in your mouth to avoid irritation. Attach your Whitening Tray (sold separately) to the AutoBrush body and activate dental-grade LED Blue Light. 

Then insert the tray in your mouth and relax or do other things for at least 10 minutes while whitening your teeth. Spit and rinse once done. Results are typically seen within 3 days but recommended to repeat for 10 days daily for optimal results!

templates.name: Ingredients of the KP Body Scrub?
templates.content:
The ingredients of the KP Body Scrub are: Perlite: A mineral derived from naturally occurring volcanic rock, it acts as a powerful physical exfoliant to buff away roughness and bumps for a microdermabrasion effect.
Lactic Acid: Making up our 14% active alpha-hydroxy acids (AHAs), this chemical exfoliant dissolves excess keratin build up in the pores that causes the appearance of KP.
Licorice Root Extract: Derived from the licorice plant, it brightens skin discoloration and soothes redness, puffiness, and itchiness.
Sunflower Seed Oil: A non-comedogenic oil derived from sunflower seeds, it is rich in vitamin E, vitamin A, and vitamin C, which deeply hydrate and protect the skin's moisture barrier.

The CLEARITY serum can be used 3 days post-needling but the CELLRENEW can be applied immediately after. So, CELLRENEW the first day then BOUNCEBACK the following days!

templates.name: What is Matcha?
templates.content: Matcha is made from a shade grown green tea, known as Gyokuro, which is carefully steamed and meticulously dried. After the steaming process, the leaves are separated from the stems. The leaves alone, called tencha are grounded into a powder called matcha. It is prepared by whisking the tea powder with hot water in a ceramic bowl. Matcha is the primary form of tea used in traditional Japanese tea ceremonies. The sweet flavor of matcha is due to the amount of amino acids present in the tea and the higher the quality, the sweeter and deeper the flavor is.

templates.name: What’s the difference between lab grown diamonds and CZ?
templates.content:
Cubic zirconia, or CZ, is a is lab-grown zirconium oxide grown specifically as a diamond imitation. Zirconium doesn't form cubic crystals naturally. To create CZ, it has to have a chemical stabilizer added to make it stable at room temperature. Usually CZ crystals have either yttrium or calcium oxide added to keep them stable. That means CZ has a range of physical, chemical and optical properties. It also means that some CZ isn't completely stable and will yellow and degrade over time. CZ has a hardness of about 8.5. 

Unlike CZ, lab-grown diamond is actually diamond. Lab grown diamonds are physically, chemically, and optically identical to mined diamonds.  The only difference is where they formed. Natural diamonds formed a billion years ago deep within the earth and lab-grown diamonds are made by man using high-tech equipment.

You string the wick through the bottom of the mold, secure it at the top and bottom so it can't move, and then you are ready to pour the wax. You can find detailed information on how to do this in our tutorial titled "How to Make Pillar Candles": https://www.lonestarcandlesupply.com/candle-making/guides/how-to-make-pillar-candles

templates.name: What's the difference between the Side Sleeper Pillow and the Back & Stomach Sleeper pillow?
templates.content:
Our two Shredded Memory Foam pillows vary in loft and support, depending on the sleep position they are designed for. In stomach and back sleeping positions, your head is positioned close to the surface of your mattress, requiring just a bit of support to keep your neck and spine aligned. We've designed The Back & Stomach Sleeper pillow with the perfect low loft (6" for standard size, 6.5" for king size) for your stomach and back sleeping positions.

In side sleeping positions, your head will be elevated just a bit from the surface of your mattress. Our Side Sleeper pillows has a medium loft (6.5" for standard size, 7.5" for king size) that fits snugly beneath your head and ensures proper spinal alignment.

templates.name: Care Instructions ( Silk, Suiting, Linen Viscose, Stretch Linen, Cotton Silk, Ramie Silk)
templates.content:
Dry clean delicate items only when needed to best preserve them.
Spot clean with cool water and delicate technique if necessary.
Do not twist fabric when drying. Instead, lay your garment flat on a towel away from direct sunlight.
Store your garments on a hanger in a cool, dry area away from sunlight.
To preserve your garment in-between dry cleaning, gently steam it to remove wrinkles and creases.
Care must be taken when using a steamer at home. Avoid pressing the steamer nozzle directly onto the fabric. You may choose to steam the garment inside out.

templates.name: What's the difference between Polarized, Non-Polarized and PureBlend Lenses?
templates.content:
Good question! Polarized lenses have an additional anti-reflective coating of film to filter bright, reflected light as well as ambient light, reducing glare during driving, water sports, and other outdoor activites. 

Non-polarized lenses do not reduce glare as well as polarized lenses, but are equally efficient at protecting against UV rays and offer enhanced clarity when viewing LCD screens on digital devices.

Our new PureBlend lens is lightweight and offers superior clarity, and durability. It is available in polarized and non-polarized options.

templates.name: Can I shave with the razor if I have Keratosis Pilaris?
templates.content: If you have keratosis pilaris and choose to shave, shaving with a single blade will be the least irritating on your skin. We recommend prepping the skin by exfoliating prior to shaving. Make sure you shave slowly and gently to avoid any irritation, and follow with your favorite moisturizer to condition the skin. If you have any additional questions or concerns about keratosis pilaris, we recommend you check in with your dermatologist.

templates.name: Are wooden wicks easy to use?
templates.content: Wooden wicks can be more challenging than a regular cotton wick but not impossible to use. Like any new element you might add to your candle, we recommend doing a series of tests before mass producing anything. The wooden wicks can be difficult to size, depending on what wax you are using. For soy wax, we don't recommend using anything smaller than the large or x-large sizes as soy wax requires more heat to burn evenly. You can refer to our sizing chart for size recommendations for paraffin here: https://www.lonestarcandlesupply.com/candle-making/candle-wicks/guide-to-wicking We don't recommend using wooden wicks in palm wax as they don't burn hot enough. It's also important to note that these wooden wicks have a "sweet spot" that you'll need to trim them down to. We recommend trimming just above a quarter of an inch for best results and we don't recommend trimming the wick between burns.

templates.name: Why is the tube colored blue?
templates.content: The GoSun's solar vacuum tube is internally coated with a microscopic layer of aluminum nitride, a powerful semiconductor. This material has the unique ability to absorb a broad spectrum of electromagnetic radiation, including ultraviolet light, which can pass through clouds when visible light can not, allowing the stove to cook a meal in less than ideal conditions.

templates.name: Bodywaver - I get crimp marks in my hair from the clamp
templates.content:
Be sure to comb your section before styling. To avoid creating crimp marks at the end of your hair, slide the iron slowly all the way down the section so that the ends of your hair are underneath the clamp before you start rolling. 

To avoid crimp marks near the root of your hair, wrap the hair section around the barrel before setting the clamp down as shown by T3 lead stylist Dan Sharp in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=86G-fVFY5YI&ab_channel=ModernSalon

templates.name: What is your Price Match Guarantee?
templates.content:

Please note, price matching is not available for special offers, coupon codes, select specialty items, customization, finale sale, clearance and/or items which ship directly from the manufacturer. Third party sellers on Amazon will be matched, and any shipping fees will be added to the total match amount.

templates.name: How do I care for my succulents?
templates.content: Succulents like lots of bright light and very little water, like a cactus. They're typically watered every 4-6 weeks, and the soil should be totally dry before watering. The easiest way to kill a succulent is by over-watering it. Succulents thrive with lots of sunlight, so placing a succulent in a South-facing window is preferred.

templates.name: What is the difference between a towel and a ultralight towel?
templates.content: Our Ultralight Towel is a microsuede material and it's thinner than our other towels and therefore packs down even smaller, plus it dries faster (though all of our towels are quick drying!). The ultralight is also smaller than the Original towel. Our Original towels (also called The Only Towel You Need) are a MicroTerry material.

templates.name: Are all towels made of same material
templates.content: Yes, all of the towels are made with post-consumer recycled plastic, and all towels are a micro terry material with the exception of the Ultralight towel, Bandana towel, the Tiny Towel and outdoor blanket which are micro suede.

templates.name: How do your sand resistant towels compare to other brands?
templates.content: Our sand-resistant towels work just as well! Unlike regular towels, sand does not stick to the microterry and/or microsuede fibers and can easily be shaken off! :)

templates.name: I am wondering what percentage of post-consumer waste is used to produce the towel. Is it 100% post-consumer waste?
templates.content: The materials we use are certified post-consumer recycled plastic by Global Recycle Standard. Some of the recycled yarns we use require a small amount of virgin material to increase the integrity of the yarn. At the moment our products contain 90%+ recycled content and we are always testing our materials to make sure the content remains as high as possible.

templates.name: Do your kids ponchos work for smaller adults?
templates.content: Our youth changing ponchos have worked great for shorter adults! They measure 31" x 35".

templates.name: Are your festival blankets waterproof?
templates.content: The Festival Blankets are water-resistant, so they greatly resist the penetration of water but if the ground is extremely wet, some moisture may get through.↵Water-proof would mean they are impervious to water and are usually treated with chemicals to make them that way (which we don't do). The water resistance of the Festival Blanket comes from the material itself which is post-consumer recycled plastic that has been turned into a layered polyester/nylon bottom. It does a great job at defending against damp grass or ground, and the top of the blanket is a soft MicroSuede.

templates.name: Why is The Cayambe Earth Towel more expensive?
templates.content: The Cayambe earth towel is a higher price because it is a double-sided print, unlike most of our towels which are single-sided. :)

templates.name: Do you use dye for the patterns?
templates.content: Our designs are always printed, never dyed. We choose not to dye our products in vats because it creates thousands of gallons of toxic waste water. Many dye houses claim they are filtering the water, and they are, but the filtering doesn't get all of the harmful metals out. It is still very toxic. Instead, we use a process called sublimation which prints the ink directly onto the product instead of dying it. It's a dry process that doesn't use any water. :)

templates.name: Where is China getting the recycled plastic bottles? Are any of the used plastic bottles from the USA?
templates.content: When we first started Nomadix, we followed the trail of plastic bottles and found that China was buying recycling from the US. Fast forward to 2019  China realized they could start their own waste management, especially because a lot of the recycled waste they received from the US was not high quality (meaning it contained unrecyclable, sometimes toxic, waste). The Nomadix factory in China is now able to locally source higher quality plastic which in doing so has eliminated one step in our supply chain.

templates.name: How to place an order for multiple recipients?
templates.content:
To place an order for multiple recipients, follow these steps: 

1. Select the item you wish to add to your cart. 
2. Once the item is added, click on "View Cart." 
3. In the cart, you should see the word "Cart" and right below it, there should be a square with a plus sign to "add recipient." 
4. Click on the square with the plus sign to add another recipient's name along with the same product. 
5. Once all recipients have been added, proceed to checkout. 
6. During checkout, you will be able to add each recipient's address before entering your payment information.

templates.name: What are the benefits of IV drip therapy?
templates.content: IV drip therapy is one of the most effective ways to deliver nutrients, vitamins, and fluids to your body, and is more efficient than oral supplements. This technique bypasses your digestive system and is administered directly into your bloodstream. Your body is able to absorb the maximum amount of nutrients and fluids since nothing is lost as a result of the digestive process. In addition, vitamins and nutrients become immediately available to your cells for use for fast results.

templates.name: I have seen similar items elsewhere for twice as much. How is this possible?
templates.content:
Other retailers have hundreds or thousands of different products at any given time, with smaller quantities of each in stock.

Since we order high quantities of just a few products, we are able to negotiate volume discounts with our vendors and pass those savings on to you.

We also keep our warehouse costs very low for the same reason, and our team is small buy mighty!

We never want to sacrifice quality, style or service, but will do everything else we can to keep our home decor affordable and attainable for all.

templates.name: What is non-frictional laser fluence?
templates.content:
Non-Fractional laser technology works by gently heating up the cells in your dermis using laser light which causes the cells some limited stress, triggering the cells to release proteins and the body to rejuvenate and renew the dermal area.
The NIRA laser penetrates through the epidermis (outer skin) and is absorbed specifically in the dermis area where your collagen and elastin cells are located. The laser raises the temperature of these cells above the level of heat-shock protein formation but below the pain threshold. This process helps to maximize the signaling of cell rejuvenation while avoiding skin damage and pain.

templates.name: Does putting milk in tea kill the antioxidants?
templates.content: No, milk won't kill the antioxidant content in tea; however, the milk proteins can bind to the polyphenols in tea and make them less effective. There are other antioxidants present in tea that milk won't block or bind to, and it won't make the tea less healthy for you unless you have an intolerance to it.

templates.name: What's the shelf life of your products?
templates.content: We're currently administering stability testing on our products to provide a more precise date based on the product. This testing will reflect how well a product retains its quality over its life span. Some products will include an expiration date, those of which have completed their stability testing. For our products that don't yet carry an expiration date, we use manufactured dates ("MFG"). This date will be located near the item lot number, typically on the bottom of the bottle or box/carton. The nutritional supplement industry has been using a 2-year standard for the shelf life, as dietary ingredients generally remain stable and potent for 2-3 years if properly maintained. That said, all products with a manufactured ("MFG") date are safe for use within 2 years of that date.

templates.name: What’s a “butt join” or butted seam?
templates.content: A seam in which the wallpaper strips meet exactly, edge to edge. The two edges of the wallpaper should be touching but not overlapping. All of our wall coverings are finished as a butted join for easy installation. A seam roller is a tool that can be used to seal the wallpaper seams and help smooth any edges that have lifted. Don't roll the seams too aggressively or you will push out all the adhesive.

templates.name: What is an active ingredient?
templates.content: An active ingredient is the most potent part of the plant extract. We take the first extraction, which can be hundreds of times more effective than the last extraction from the same extract. Similar to how a tea bag works - the first cup of tea it makes is strong and intense, the more its used in additional cups, the weaker and less effective it becomes.

templates.name: Why does the shipping box have a warning label on it?
templates.content: Due to stringent laws in CA (Prop 65), all products must ship with a warning label as the product "Toluene" is used in the factory. This chemical is used to remove glue or stains in final quality control. It is not an ingredient in our products. However, since products are delivered through White Glove Delivery service, the packaging may be removed on the delivery truck.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can cancel your warranty, often for a full or partial refund. Log into your account and go to the 'My Account' page: https://upsie.com/account/my-stuff From there, find your warranty and hit the 'Cancel' button. Once you provide a reason and hit submit, we'll process your cancellation. When you cancel your plan within 30 days of plan purchase and haven't made an approved claim, you'll receive a full refund. If you cancel your plan after 30 days of warranty purchase and haven't made a claim, you'll receive a prorated refund based on how many days remain on your warranty term minus a 10% cancellation fee calculated from the prorated amount. Refunds aren't available on any warranty plan with an approved claim. If you dispute a charge without submitting a cancellation request, we'll charge a $25 fee to cover the cost of the chargeback.

It gives many of the benefits of fasting. ProLon can help you lose weight and belly fat, jump- start healthy eating habits, improve your energy and focus, and rejuvenate your cells.

Multiple cycles of ProLon support metabolic and overall health for healthy aging, and supports maintenance of a healthy systolic blood pressure and other metabolic markers.

templates.name: Balance Oil – Aren’t Omega 6’s bad for you? Should I still take fish oil?
templates.content: Balance oil provides your essential parent oils. Linoleic acid and alpha linolenic acid are essential dietary oils, they act as signaling molecules within the body, and make a whole host of downstream metabolites. Balance oil doesn't replace our need for DHA, and our need for GLA for that matter. We like to recommend whole food sources of EPA and DHA like fish and caviar. We don't recommend fish oil supplementation unless you have a fish allergy and can't consume whole food sources of DHA. In those cases, we recommend only using a C02 extracted form of fish oil due to the high levels of rancidity found in fish oil supplements. Our Fish Oil is C02 extracted. Excess fish oil creates high levels of oxidative stress in the body. Remember that balance is key. We tend to have a hyper focus on omega 3 and forget that LA (omega 6) is our mother essential fatty acid.

templates.name: Is Thermella replacing Relizen?
templates.content: Please note that Thermella is not replacing Relizen. Thermella and Relizen work differently in the body to relieve hot flashes and night sweats. Thermella relieves hot flashes at the source by blocking NKB, a peptide in the body's thermoregulatory center that triggers hot flashes and night sweats. Relizen relieves hot flashes by inhibiting the reuptake of serotonin in the body. In independent clinical studies on each of these treatments, they were shown to be effective in reducing hot flashes and night sweats, as well as improving sleep. That said, you can use them together.

templates.name: What foods have Vitamin B?

templates.name: Polish application steps
templates.content:
Start by pushing the cuticles back, then cut or file your nails to shape leaving no jagged edges. Cleanse the nail plate with alcohol or nail cleanser, apply a base coat (making sure to seal nail edges- reduces chips), and allow it to dry.

Apply a first thin coat of lacquer to each nail (working one hand at a time) and a second coat of lacquer to each nail- allow to dry before applying the top coat. Finally apply the high gloss top coat and remember to allow the lacquer to fully dry before any activities.

templates.name: Best care/cleaning/washing tips for linen sheets?
templates.content: Our linen is machine washable. We recommend washing them on the gentle cycle with like colors and using a mild, liquid laundry detergent. Do not bleach, tumble dry on low heat, and remove them from the dryer promptly. We suggest using Wool Dryer Balls instead of dryer sheets to reduce waste and increase fluffiness of the textile. Linen naturally has a more relaxed look that does not require ironing. However, if you'd like more structure, iron it with warm heat on the milder "linen" setting.

templates.name: Rainy growing conditions (Florida, the South, etc)
templates.content: As long as they have an excellent drainage system, they should be able to handle the weather. One of the most crucial parts of working with succulents is having well-draining soil. Succulent roots will rot if they sit in water or wet soil for too long. If the soil you are working with doesn't drain well, you can add a soil amendment such as pumice, perlite, or coarse sand. These will help loosen the soil and allow the water to drain more quickly, thus allowing the soil to dry faster. When planting succulents in the ground, creating mounds or planting on a hill will also help increase the drainage. Also, placing them in containers with both drainage holes and base rocks will help decrease rot.

templates.name: How do I take care of metal beads?
templates.content:
Most of our Metal Beads come with an "e-Coating" applied to avoid tarnishing and prevent plating rubbing off. Metals react with the environment through a natural process of oxidization that occurs when exposed to sulfides in the air. This process will affect most metal beads and plated beads in the same manner. Some prefer the antiqued or oxidized appearance that results from environmental reactions. Those who prefer the natural unoxidized appearance can apply a coating of Urethane Spray ( we recommend Rustoleum Crystal Clear Enamel Spray ) to beads before their use in jewelry. To remove the oxidation or tarnish, we recommend a jewelry grade "Tarnish Removal Solution" on the metal beads only.

If the beads are in a finished piece of jewelry then a solution may ruin the finish of a gemstone, a coral, or a pearl. Store your metal beads with an "anti-Tarnish" pouch or anti-tarnish strip to diminish the oxidation.

templates.name: How do you measure blue (HEV) light protection?
templates.content: Blue (HEV) light protection is tested by measuring the ability of the formula to block light in the HEV spectrum that would otherwise reach the skin. In practice, this is done by applying the formula to a transparent substrate at the same dose level (2mg/cm2) used in the FDA Monograph SPF test. The substrate is then placed at the entrance of an integrating sphere detector which captures all the light passing through the sample. This configuration is the same as that used in the FDA Monograph Critical Wavelength measurement and mimics the situation of a formula applied to the skin. The percentage of HEV light blocked is calculated by comparing the intensity of the light transmitted through the formula to the incident light at each wavelength throughout the HEV spectrum (400-490 nm).

templates.name: How do I set up my new Allswell mattress?
templates.content:
Allswell mattress set up is an incredibly simple 4-step process! First, unbox your mattress and place it at the end of your bed. It's helpful to have two people but it can be done solo. Carefully cut open the first layer of plastic and position your mattress. The Allswell logo should be placed at the foot of your bed. Once placed, cut the second layer, and watch the magic unfold!

Allow your mattress to expand fully. You should see an inflated mattress in just a few short minutes but it may take up to 48 hours to reach peak height. Finally, dress your bed with your sheets, coverlet, duvet... whatever makes you feel most Allswell!

templates.name: What is the difference between the perfume oils and essential oils?

Obtained directly from the plant, essential oils are naturally complex with as many as 175 different chemical components.

templates.name: How to delete account?
templates.content:
Please note that the process of deleting an account would have to be on your end. Once this process is completed, you (and us) will no longer be able to access prior purchase information from our website, and we won't be able to assist with past purchases, refunds, replacement products, etc.. as the information will be gone from our system. After going through the steps below, if you'd like to shop again with this same email, you will have to create a new account.

1. Go to the Bonobos Information Management Center: https://bonobos.attn.tv/a6X8mudgVQrV
2. Enter your state of residence
 - Note: The privacy options offered are laid out according to the specific privacy laws that each state enforces. If choosing your home state does not give you the option to "Delete My Information," then you may input California. Our Privacy Team has assured us it is okay to do so even if you do not live in California
3. From the available options choose "Delete My Personal Information"
4. Fill out the form and click "Submit"
5. An identity authentication message will be sent to your email (You must complete this in order to finish submitting your request)
6. Once you've done all of the above, a ticket will have been submitted to the Bonobos Privacy Team via the program "One Trust." You will receive a confirmation email via this ticket from Bonobos Privacy Team <noreply@m.onetrust.com> once your request has been completed.

templates.name: Can you explain how adherence/water- and sweat- resistance is tested?
templates.content:
We follow the FDA guidelines for testing water resistance or adherence to the skin after exposure to water. A panel of 10 people apply the product to their skin prior to being immersed in a whirlpool (of moving or circulating water) for 20-minute cycles. After 20 minutes in the whirlpool, panelists exit the whirlpool before immersing themselves again. For 40 minutes water resistance, panelists are immersed in the 
water for two 20-minute cycles. For 80 minutes water resistance, this is done a total of 4 times. 

After all cycles are completed, the SPF that is remaining on the skin is measured. If after 80 minutes in the whirlpool, the SPF remaining is at least 50, the result is an SPF 50 with 80 minutes of water resistance.

templates.name: What is an Adaptogen?
templates.content: Adaptogens are intuitive herbs and mushrooms capable of adapting to the needs of the human body. They work synergistically with the pituitary, hypothalamic, and adrenal glands to reduce chronic stress and fatigue. In other words, they help your body find the "sweet spot," so you can feel calm and energized at the same time. Adaptogens have been used in Chinese and Ayurvedic medicine for centuries. templates.name: Is bamboo bedding antimicrobial?
templates.content: Bamboo has natural antimicrobial properties, and our Oeko-Tex® and FSC® certified bamboo bedding products take on those qualities. However, the natural antimicrobial protection does gradually wear off with use and washing.

templates.name: What does the Nixon name and symbol mean?
templates.content: The name Nixon was simply chosen as a fun and strong name that would make people wonder. Numerous names were thrown around when the company was started, and Nixon was the one everyone unanimously agreed on. As far as the Nixon symbol goes, it consists of three components. The inside shape represents the bottom of hourglass. The outside shape represents the wings of time, and the whole shape together represents a flame. These three symbols were chosen to represent something that is timeless.

templates.name: After I see results, should I continue to take Nutrafol?
templates.content: Yes! Seeing results is a positive thing, but a lot of the ingredients in Nutrafol need to be taken consistently to keep showing you those results. If you did not make any lifestyle changes to improve your root causes of poor hair health (like diet, lifestyle exposures, and stress), your body will require the added support of the ingredients in Nutrafol.

templates.name: How do I hand wash my knitted clothes?
templates.content: In lukewarm water, about 20°C (70°F), add special cashmere/wool shampoo and stir to dissolve evenly. Soak the garment in the wash basin, but don't leave it to soak for long. Squeeze gently until it's clean. To completely remove the shampoo, rinse in clean water thoroughly but carefully. Gently squeeze out the excess water, but don't wring the garment for it will lose its shape. To dry, please try to shape the garment to its original form and lay it flat. For quick drying, you may roll the garment with a towel. In doing so, roll slowly to avoid wrinkles. Straighten the garment back to its original shape after unrolling. Lay it flat to dry completely. Never tumble dry or hang dry your cashmere pieces.

templates.name: What's an "Effective TT Measurement"?
templates.content: Effective Top Tube (ETT) is a traditional way to measure a bike's length. It measures a horizontal line, parallel to the ground, from the center of the head tube to the intersection with the seat tube or seat post. This number is useful for identifying how long a bike will feel while in a seated position. Hope it helps.

templates.name: What is the difference between Pigment Dye and Garment Dye?
templates.content: Garment dye is the process of uniquely dying a garment to a specific color after it's been cut and sewn. This is the last step in the supply chain before it makes its way to inventory. With garment dye products, there will be some naturally occurring shade variations. Our pigment dye collection also falls under the garment dye umbrella. To distinguish a pigment dye item from that of the garment dye variety on our website, look for the following colors: Clove, Mushroom, Patchouli, and Rose-Quartz. Unlike garment dye, pigment dye's unique muted color tones reveal the complex texture of our fabrics. Garment dye does not produce identical colors bath to bath and every piece is slightly unique in order to get that softness and pre-shrunk sizing that we advertise. If looking to complete a set from a prior purchase, please note a perfect color match won't always be the case. All garment dyed items are marked with a "GD" after the item code.

templates.name: How does it compare to kibble?
templates.content: Most kibble is produced by heating the food at super high temperatures in a process known as extrusion. This has two problematic side effects: it destroys the nutrient quality and reduces satiety. As a result, the kibble has to be sprayed with fats to make it palatable, and then topped up with artificial minerals and vitamins that were destroyed in the heating process. Not to mention most kibble contains synthetic preservatives. Because of the gentle air-drying process, kibble doesn't face these issues - almost all of the nutrients are preserved and your bestie is left with delicious, jerky-like food for every meal.

templates.name: What is the purpose of lash anchors?

You can use these anchors in either corner of your eyes or under each magnet of your magnetic lash. They come in extremely handy when you're looking for that extra staying power. Lash anchors basically sandwich your natural lash between the magnetic lash and itself, to ensure that your lashes will stay in place all day long. templates.name: What temperature can Seamless hair extensions be styled at?/Does heat damage the base of the wefts?
templates.content: When styling your Seamless extensions with a heat styling tool, we recommend setting your tool at 120C/250F degrees or lower. Anything higher may run the risk of damaging the hair. This is because the hair is not being revitalized at the scalp like our natural hair is, and over time excessive heat and high temperatures may cause wear and tear to your set, and could potentially loosen the silicone bond with the hair. Generally speaking, heat will not damage the base of the weft unless it is very high.

templates.name: Vitamin C + Heat
templates.content: Vitamin C is a water-soluble sensitive nutrient, however, the negative effects of heat denaturing start at 158°F. In general, the number of nutrients lost during heating will vary depending on the food and the process used to cook the food (time and temperature). We carefully share methods and recipes that will minimally affect the nature of the nutrients, in addition, all of the products contain an Organic nutrient blend that accounts for any loss during processing.

We will take your feedback regarding texture/application into account when developing future products. Please reach out to our Concierge Team at concierge@colorescience.com for any further concerns or to initiate a return.

templates.name: How much should my baby or toddler be eating?
templates.content: Depending on your child, consumption amount varies. Babies can enjoy Tiny as a full meal and toddlers as a meal, or a healthy side or a snack. Babies on average should have 1-2 meals from 6-8 months, 3 meals by 9 months, and toddlers 3 meals and 2 snacks by 12 months of age.

templates.name: Difference in the 6 uplight kits from Costco vs Volt / Why is Costco's cheaper?
templates.content: The Lights from Costco use less brass in their design so they're going to weigh and cost less. The slightly more important difference is that they will not have threading at the base of the fixtures for the stake. It attaches differently to a Costco light. The only reason that would matter is if you were planning on using any of the specialty mounts on our website; like the surface mount or the flagpole mount.

templates.name: Do your products contain flavonoids or Limeonene?
templates.content: Absolutely (and that's great)! Because of our gentle encapsulation, we are able to maintain the delicate flavonoids (including limonene) that are naturally found in citrus oils. Flavonoids are a group of plant metabolites thought to provide health benefits through cell signaling pathways and antioxidant effects. These molecules are found in a variety of fruits and vegetables. Limonene is found in citrus peels/rinds and is the thing that makes oranges and lemons smell orangey and lemony.

templates.name: How cold is a skincare fridge?

templates.name: What do I do if I see spots on my knife blade?
templates.content:
We use the best quality Hi-Carbon stainless steel in our knives to ensure the best hardness, best edge retention, and ease of sharpening. All steel alloys, especially those with Hi-Carbon are prone to surface discoloring or even rust if knives are not cared for correctly. To ensure your knives stay stain-free, always remember to hand-wash in warm soapy water after each use and then immediately dry thorougly with a soft cloth.

If spots appear, these are generally just surface "patina" discolorations that can be easily removed. We recommed using Bar Keepers Friend. It's a great product to keep any steel in fine shape and you can check it out here: https://lamsonproducts.com/collections/sharpening-honing-protection/products/bar-keepers-friend-cleaner-26-oz

templates.name: What is a solid spacer?
templates.content: A solid spacer replaces the crush sleeve in a differential. It's a solid piece of machined steel that is slightly shorter than a crush sleeve and comes with a variety of shims. The shims are stacked with the solid spacer to achieve different levels of preload on a pinion, the same way as a crush sleeve. The advantage of using a solid spacer and shim set up is that you don't need to worry about over-tightening the pinion nut, as you do with a crush sleeve. Also, once the preload is set, you never need to worry about adjusting it or replacing anything, like if you have to replace a yoke. When setting preload, you add shims to decrease the amount of preload on the pinion bearings, and remove shims to increase the amount of preload on the bearings.

templates.name: Twirl Trio - How do I change the barrel?
templates.content:
Turn the heat all the way off by pressing and holding the Power & Temperature Switch. Hold the tool by the handle with the barrel pointing up. Push the locking mechanism (the rose gold stand in the middle of the tool) to the left until the dot lines up with the "unlock" icon- you will hear a "click". Then pull the barrel out. 

To insert a new barrel, line up the three side pins in the barrel with the slots in the handle and insert the barrel firmly into the handle. Turn the locking mechanism to the lock position - you will hear a "click".

templates.name: How can I keep my skin from turning black or green?
templates.content: Experiment with wearing jewelry for shorter periods of time (for instance, make it the last thing you put on before you leave your house and the first thing you take off. Try and clean your jewelry with liquid soap and water and dry well between wears, and don't wear your jewelry while exercising.

templates.name: How do I set up my mattress?
templates.content:
Setting up your mattress is easy! Simply take the mattress out of the box and lay it on the front of your bed frame. Carefully unwrap or carefully cut the plastic cover to allow for decompression of your mattress. This can take a few minutes to fully decompress.

Note that while the majority of decompression occurs within the first few minutes of unboxing, decompression does continue for up to 24 hours after unwrapping.

templates.name: Price Matching
templates.content: We offer competitive prices for all of our items. We'll match select competitor's pricing on the exact same item with proof of price either in-store or by contacting a customer care representative via chat or phone prior to placing your order*. For proof of price via chat or by phone, a direct link to the lower priced item would need to be provided by the customer. The item must be currently in-stock on VitaminShoppe.com and on the competitor's website at the time the price match is requested. We'll verify item eligibility by reviewing the online retailer, their current price, and by confirming it's in stock. We reserve the right to verify the price and the availability of an identical item (i.e. size, model, quantity, brand, color). Price match cannot be combined with current or prior Vitaminshoppe.com sales, discounts or specials. The Vitamin Shoppe® has the final decision for all price matches.

templates.name: Can I layer two tattoos?
templates.content:
You can! A couple of things to remember:

- Make sure the adhesive on the second tattoo is not applied over the ink of the first tattoo. If it is, you may actually remove some of the original tattoo's ink from the top layer of your skin when peeling off the applicator. 
- Peel the applicator off slowly, as your skin may be a tad sensitive from the first tattoo you applied.

templates.name: What's the difference between your beach and bath towels?
templates.content: Our towels are made of 100% Turkish Organic Cotton. The Long staple fibers used in it help to make the towels absorb moisture quicker. The lightness of the towels helps them to air dry super quickly. We have the bath towel and beach towel collection. Since the beach towels are flat woven, they're sand resistant. These are designed for beach and pool. Bath towels are single-sided or double-sided terry looped making them non-sand resistant as the sand might get into the loops, however, our single-sided terry looped bath towels are sand resistant on the flat woven side. Our bath towels are thicker due to the terry looping than our beach towels. The looping allows them to absorb more but since the other side is not looped, they'll dry quicker. Since our bath towels are made of Turkish cotton with high moisture absorbency, they're more absorbent than the conventional bath towels that are available in the market.

We want to give our customers a greater understanding of the products they receive. To do so, we send every batch to an independent, third-party lab to undergo a GC/MS test to confirm that the oils are free from any chemicals, adulterants, and contaminants.

Once the test is completed and signed by a chemist, verifying that the test is valid, we display the results of each batch on our website. All of our customers can see for themselves that because our oils are 100% pure, they provide the highest-therapeutic properties that nature has to offer!

templates.name: I have a tree nut allergy. Is Cocofloss safe to use?
templates.content:
Cocofloss threads are coated with refined coconut oil. While it is possible to be allergic to coconut, the cross-reactivity for those with tree nut allergies is very rare and most individuals who are allergic to tree nuts can safely eat coconut. Please consult with your allergist for more information and to determine if you have a specific allergy to coconuts. 

Other than coconut oil, there are no peanuts or tree nuts in our production line or facility.

templates.name: Will DYEposit cover Gray hair?
templates.content: Gray hair can be stubborn about holding onto pigments in dyes. Since DYEposit contains a lighter pigment load, it may not contain enough to add a tint to gray hair. A few of our darker shades of semi-permanent dye might add a light tint to your hair. I'd suggest trying our PPL Eater, Rock Lobster, Blue Ruin, or Live Laugh Love. If you'd like to use another shade of ours, we suggest pre-lightening your hair with our lightening kit before dyeing it.

templates.name: What is the difference between VX42 vs X50?
templates.content: X50 is a 500d face fabric with Mylar backing. The VX42 is 420 denier fabric with 70d backing. The 500d is more abrasion resistant, but also picks up more cat and dog hair, whereas the 420d fabric is glossier and doesn't pick up dusts and hair that easily.

templates.name: When do I use the cryodrop in my skincare routine?
templates.content: The Cryodrop was designed to be used in the morning upon waking up. If you are a user of our SiO wrinkle smoothing patches while you sleep, then the Cryodrop should be used upon removal of the patches and after you wash your face. The serum should be used on cleansed and toned skin before the application of thicker moisturizers (if necessary) or sunscreens. The Cryodrop can be taken on the go and can be used as a touch up tool throughout the day. The cold touch can help bring down the look of puffiness while the massage can help to relax facial muscles.

templates.name: What grinders do you recommend?

A burr grinder will give you a more consistent grind and result in an overall better tasting brew. There are many to choose from in varying price ranges. A few electric grinders we recommend using are: Cuisinart DBM-8 Supreme Grind Automatic Burr Mill, Capresso 560.04 Infinity Conical Burr Grinder, Stainless Finish and Ariete -Delonghi Electric Coffee Grinder. A couple of manual grinders we recommend using are the Ceramic Burr Manual Grinder and the Hario Mini Mill.

templates.name: How should I take Butyrate?
templates.content: With butyrate, you must start slowly. Take one capsule a day for the first week, followed by 2 a day the next (either together or separated), then three the following week (separate 2 + 1) and finally four (separate 2 + 2). Now, work backward to a comfortable level for you, usually two capsules a day.

templates.name: What EV components require regular maintenance?
templates.content: One of the best things about an EV is that you won't have to pay for tune-ups, oil changes , spark plugs, drive belts, or transmission servicing. But EVs are still cars. Because they are heavier than conventional gasoline vehicles, their suspension components will work harder, and will need more frequent inspections and maintenance. You should also expect to regularly have the climate control system and cabin air filters inspected and serviced. You will also be replacing tires on an electric vehicle more frequently. Make sure to find replacement tires that will support the weight and performance of your vehicle without impacting its range.

templates.name: System: Coravin won’t pour
templates.content:
We're sorry you've been having some difficulty with your Coravin. There are several things that may be affecting the pour. These tips may help.

First, ensure there is gas in the Coravin. When you press the trigger you should hear a "psst" indicating there is gas in the capsule. If you don't hear gas you may need to replace the capsule. However, you also want to check to ensure that your needle is not clogged. To check for a clogged needle, unscrew the needle from the Coravin System and then try a quick press of the trigger again. If you hear gas flow, then it's likely that your needle is clogged by some small cork particles. If you do not hear Gas with the needle removed, then you're likely out of gas and need a new Coravin Capsule.

Finally, the Coravin may need to be cleaned. Place the spout of the system under a stream of warm tap water to rinse. Allow the water to drip out of the spout and needle. Once the system has been rinsed, place it upright and Quick Press the trigger twice to release some gas. This will clear any excess water in the system. Caution - never press the trigger while the spout is under the water stream.

You may find these videos helpful as well: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D6VfSX9Q3Rc and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xs2vaEFqYdY

templates.name: What's the difference between Advanced Whitening and regular Whitening Toothpaste?
templates.content:
Our advanced whitening toothpaste and our regular whitening toothpaste are both great in cleaning and whitening your teeth, but their main difference boils down to an ingredient called sodium phytate.

It's a common ingredient used for teeth whitening, and our advanced whitening toothpaste utilizes this to level up that visibly brighter smile. This is the best toothpaste for you if you want to see results faster. It's also important to note that sodium phytate can have strong effects that may cause increased sensitivity. So if you have sensitive teeth or gums, it's best to stick to our regular foaming toothpaste.

templates.name: What is Hydration Replenisher?
templates.content: Hydration Replenisher is an electrolyte (sodium and potassium) drink mix that consists of Vitamin C, D, B-Complex, and Zinc for immune support. Cramping is caused by a deficiency of electrolytes and the two most important electrolytes are sodium and potassium. We recommend taking the product before and after workouts, depending on how vigorous the exercise is that day.

templates.name: How do I select my hair structure (for hair quiz)?
templates.content:
Please note that hair structure doesn't refer to the number of hair strands you have, but rather the thickness of each individual strand.

- Fine: A single strand is thinner than a sewing thread. If you take a strand of hair between your fingers you don't feel anything.
- Medium: A single strand is about the thickness of a sewing thread. If you take a strand of hair between your fingers you can feel the hair.
- Coarse: A single strand is thicker than a sewing thread. If you take a strand of hair between your fingers you can feel a strong, thick strand.

templates.name: How do I care for my Cooling Foam Pillow?
templates.content: To keep your pillow clean, spot treat any spills or stains with water and gentle detergent, taking care not to soak the pillow.

templates.name: Where is the Super73 Service Center located?
templates.content: Our dedicated service center is at the same building as our showroom location, but a different entrance around the corner (2642 Gates Ave, Irvine, CA 92606). It's also for drop-off services only, we can't guarantee same-day pick-up. Walk-ins are welcomed but we encourage you to make appointments by giving us a call at (949) 989-4948 or emailing us directly at servicecenterirvine@super73.com. We're open Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (we still accept drop offs on Sat 10am-4pm through the showroom entrance).

templates.name: What is an Oversize charge?
templates.content: Products that are considered to be oversized due to the weight or dimensions of the shipping box will be shipped by Economy or Ground per requirements of the shipping service provider. An additional charge per oversized item will be added to the shipping charges due to the increase in cost by the shipping service provider for larger or heavier items.

templates.name: Referral
templates.content: If it helps to know, we have a rewards/referral program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.thekooples.com/us_en/refer-a-friend

templates.name: What makes Blissy's 22-momme silk superior to standard 19-momme silk?
templates.content:
With a thickness nearly 15% higher than standard 19-momme silk, Blissy's 22-momme silk is dramatically smoother, shinier, and more durable. This thick weight of mulberry silk is prized for its luxurious feel and durability.

The superior resilience of Blissy's 22-momme silk means our products will maintain their beauty and resist wear for years. Our silk delivers amazing long-term value compared to cheaper 19-momme versions. Treat yourself to long-lasting luxury!

templates.name: What are the dimensions of the Pillow Protectors?
templates.content: The pillow protector has the same dimensions as our pillowcases in their corresponding sizes.

templates.name: Can I shower with the jewellery on?
templates.content: Yes, you can, but getting body products on it can cause discoloration and the steam can also wear on the chain.

templates.name: How soon can I start to wear my baby in the sling?
templates.content: Most newborns can be worn right away. If your baby has health challenges or weighs less than 8 lbs, you should discuss babywearing with your healthcare practitioner.

templates.name: Gasket/rubber replacement
templates.content: Thank you for reaching out! Gaskets are not sold individually. Each blade comes with a deep-seated gasket to ensure that it does not fall out. We do not sell replacement gaskets because gaskets are difficult to properly install and get stretched or damaged in the process. If you do find nutribullet gaskets for sale, do not buy them. They are counterfeit and not recommended for use with your nutribullet. If the gasket becomes unseated, we recommend replacing the blade assembly.

templates.name: Why do I see different prices?
templates.content: Our inventory and prices are subject to change and we often run sitewide promotions so feel free to check our website frequently to stay up to date.
